company_overview:
At Siam Pharmaceutical, we take pride in making quality pharmaceutical products affordable. To achieve this,
Siam Bheasach Co. Ltd. a GMP (good manufacturing practice) certified facility was set up with the capability to produce all pharmaceutical dosage forms: injectable, topical, oral preparations. To ensure quality, efficacy and safety of our products,
 we also conduct bioequivalent studies and clinical studies of our products at various academic institutions.
Our manufacturing plants are ISO 9000 and aIso 14001 certified. In 2002, Siam Bheasach's laboratory was the first pharmaceutical laboratory in Thailand to be ISO/IEC
 17025 certified aligning the laboratory's capability to test various products with reliable results with international standard.
company_benefits_incentives: Overtime pay, Performance bonus, Five-day work week

 boundaries.

company_overview:
Regional Container Lines (RCL) started as a Common Feeder Operator, operating its first feeder container ship in 1979 between Bangkok and Singapore. In
 1988, RCL was listed on the Stock Exchange of Thailand, and has since achieved satisfactory performance and financial returns to shareholders. RCL will increasingly expand its feeder services and container liner business in Asia through the provision of high
 quality container shipping services with reliable fix day sailings, fast transit, the deployment of modern and high specification container ships and customer service information technology.
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Gratuity, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Overtime pay, Performance bonus, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

ttb spark | จุดไอเดีย...ให้ทุกสิ่งเป็นจริงได้

ttb spark คือ Digital Hub ของ ทีเอ็มบีธนชาต หรือ ทีทีบี (ttb) ที่มีความเชื่อและความมุ่งมั่นที่จะสร้าง การเปลี่ยนแปลงที่มีความหมาย ให้กับชีวิตของลูกค้า ผ่านดิจิทัลเทคโนโลยีและไอเดียที่สร้างสรรค์ โดยไม่ยึดติดกับกรอบความคิดเดิมๆ

ttb spark เน้นการทำงานแบบ Agile เพื่อพัฒนาโซลูชัน บริการ รวมไปถึงนวัตกรรมดิจิทัล ที่ตอบสนองกับการเปลี่ยนแปลงทางด้านเทคโนโลยี และความต้องการของลูกค้าที่รวดเร็ว เพื่อให้ลูกค้าของเรามีชีวิตทางการเงินที่ดีขึ้นอย่างแท้จริง

company_overview:
PRIMO: Omnichannel Marketing Platform
PRIMO is a B2B Startup focusing on building enterprise-grade Omnichannel Marketing Technology. We empower companies to Foster Deeper Relationships with their customers and partners through
 collecting consumer data and utilizing data of membership that they already have.
Our service
CRM solution - Connect with each individual personally. Collect and understand customer behavior in a systematic approach.
Marketing engagement solution - Deliver personalized privileges to your members by using PRIMO customer engagement platform to offer hyper-personalized experience.
Partnership tools - Enable corporate and merchants to optimize below-the-line marketing campaigns by giving discounts and special offers to targeted members of existing membership programs.
Our solutions are being used by multi-leading enterprises here in Thailand including Central The 1, Siam Piwat, Bangkok Bank, Carabao, CJ Express, PP Group and so on. 
Our Culture
PRIMO culture "ทำให้ได้-ทำให้ได้" is based-on modern Agile Organization process. We employ flexible ways for working and empower every individual. Everyone at PRIMO values collaboration
 and commitment to each others and to our clients.
PRIMO is a Thailand-based startup founded by 2 MIT Sloan graduates who have diverse backgrounds in retail technology and consumer banking.
PRIMO is funded by SOSV, one of the world top five leaders in early-stage startups investment
company_benefits_incentives: Medical insurance, Work from home

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), DBA, Transportation & Logistics, Supply Chain, E-commerce, Supply Chain
company_overview:
Central Retail Corporation Public Company Limited (“the Company” or “Central Retail”)
Central Retail's business is organized into three operating segments namely fashion, hardline, and food. Each segment hosts a portfolio of retail banners under which Central Retail sells
 a wide range of merchandise, and each of its retail banners is distinguished based on a variety of characteristics, including store network, store format, merchandise offerings, branding strategy and market positioning.

Fashion Segment 
Our fashion segment focuses on fashion merchandise and consumer products, ranging from international luxury brands to everyday labels. The retail banners within this segment provide a wide selection of apparel, accessories, beauty, shoes, homeware
 and other merchandise designed for the broad tastes and preferences of our customers. 

Food Segment 
Focused on catering to changing tastes and trends in food and consumer goods, our food segment encompasses a range of retail banners that offer a wide selection of high quality grocery, organic and health foods, beverages and popular consumer staples, sourced
 both domestically and abroad.

Hardline Segment 
Consumer electronics, home decoration, construction materials and DIY products are all to be found under our hardline segment. Each of the retail banners within this segment targets a specific group of customers with definable shopping needs, including home
 improvement, furnishings and fixtures, and electronics.

Omni-Channel Experience
We operate web stores for Central Department Store, Robinson Department Store, Supersports, Looksi, TheOutlet24, Tops, Power Buy, Nguyen Kim, and Baan & Beyond
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Overtime pay, Performance bonus, Five-day work week

job_desc: {'Job Specification\xa0': ['รวบรวมและวิเคราะห์ความต้องการของ User และสามารถให้คำปรึกษาแนะนำกระบวนการทำงานให้กับ user ได้', 'จัดทำเอกสาร Business Requirements โดยสามารถแปลงความต้องการทาง Business เข้ากับความต้องการของระบบได้', 'จัดทำ Test Scenario\xa0 และ Test Cases และนำการทดสอบระบบกับ User (UAT)', 'ควบคุมคุณภาพของระบบงานให้เป็นไปตาม Business Requirements และควบคุม timeline ให้สามารถส่งมอบงานได้ตามกำหนดและ Sign Off', 'วิเคราะห์ปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้นของระบบงานประจำวันและหาวิธีการแก้ไขร่วมกับ User และ IT', 'มีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์\xa0 มีการสื่อสารที่ดีและสามารถประสานงานกับคนจากแต่ละหน่วยงานเพื่อให้งานสำเร็จ', 'มีทักษะในการวิเคราะห์\xa0 แก้ปัญหา\xa0 เจรจาต่อรอง และมุ่งมั่นต่อความสำเร็จของงาน', 'สามารถทำงานแบบ Multi Tasking\xa0'], 'Qualification': ['วุฒิการศึกษาป.ตรี หรือสูงกว่า ด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ, คอมพิวเตอร์ธุรกิจ หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้อง', 'มีประสบการณ์การทำงานในตำแหน่งเจ้าหน้าที่วิเคราะห์ระบบงานอย่างน้อย 5 ปี', 'มีประสบการณ์ธุรกิจประกันชีวิตหรือประกันภัย']}
qualification: {'Job Specification\xa0รวบรวมและวิเคราะห์ความต้องการของ User และสามารถให้คำปรึกษาแนะนำกระบวนการทำงานให้กับ user ได้จัดทำเอกสาร Business Requirements โดยสามารถแปลงความต้องการทาง Business เข้ากับความต้องการของระบบได้จัดทำ Test Scenario\xa0 และ Test Cases และนำการทดสอบระบบกับ User (UAT)ควบคุมคุณภาพของระบบงานให้เป็นไปตาม Business Requirements และควบคุม timeline ให้สามารถส่งมอบงานได้ตามกำหนดและ Sign Offวิเคราะห์ปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้นของระบบงานประจำวันและหาวิธีการแก้ไขร่วมกับ User และ ITมีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์\xa0 มีการสื่อสารที่ดีและสามารถประสานงานกับคนจากแต่ละหน่วยงานเพื่อให้งานสำเร็จมีทักษะในการวิเคราะห์\xa0 แก้ปัญหา\xa0 เจรจาต่อรอง และมุ่งมั่นต่อความสำเร็จของงานสามารถทำงานแบบ Multi Tasking\xa0Qualificationวุฒิการศึกษาป.ตรี หรือสูงกว่า ด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ, คอมพิวเตอร์ธุรกิจ หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์การทำงานในตำแหน่งเจ้าหน้าที่วิเคราะห์ระบบงานอย่างน้อย 5 ปีมีประสบการณ์ธุรกิจประกันชีวิตหรือประกันภัย': 'รวบรวมและวิเคราะห์ความต้องการของ User และสามารถให้คำปรึกษาแนะนำกระบวนการทำงานให้กับ user ได้จัดทำเอกสาร Business Requirements โดยสามารถแปลงความต้องการทาง Business เข้ากับความต้องการของระบบได้จัดทำ Test Scenario\xa0 และ Test Cases และนำการทดสอบระบบกับ User (UAT)ควบคุมคุณภาพของระบบงานให้เป็นไปตาม Business Requirements และควบคุม timeline ให้สามารถส่งมอบงานได้ตามกำหนดและ Sign Offวิเคราะห์ปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้นของระบบงานประจำวันและหาวิธีการแก้ไขร่วมกับ User และ ITมีมนุษย์สัมพันธ์\xa0 มีการสื่อสารที่ดีและสามารถประสานงานกับคนจากแต่ละหน่วยงานเพื่อให้งานสำเร็จมีทักษะในการวิเคราะห์\xa0 แก้ปัญหา\xa0 เจรจาต่อรอง และมุ่งมั่นต่อความสำเร็จของงานสามารถทำงานแบบ Multi Tasking\xa0', 'Job Specification\xa0': 'วุฒิการศึกษาป.ตรี หรือสูงกว่า ด้านเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ, คอมพิวเตอร์ธุรกิจ หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์การทำงานในตำแหน่งเจ้าหน้าที่วิเคราะห์ระบบงานอย่างน้อย 5 ปีมีประสบการณ์ธุรกิจประกันชีวิตหรือประกันภัย'}

company_overview:
บริษัท ไอโออิ กรุงเทพ ประกันภัย จำกัด(มหาชน) ดำเนินธุรกิจด้านประกันวินาศภัย โดยมีผู้ร่วมทุนเป็นบริษัทประกันภัยชั้นนำจากประเทศญี่ปุ่น และก่อตั้งมานานกว่า 67 ปี ซึ่งมีสำนักงานใหญ่ตั้งอยู่ในกรุงเทพฯ
 และมีสำนักงานสาขาต่างจังหวัด กระจายอยู่ทั่วประเทศ ขณะนี้กำลังเปิดรับผู้สมัครที่มีความรู้ ความสามารถ และต้องการร่วมเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของบริษัทฯ เข้าร่วมงาน โดยผู้ที่ได้รับการคัดเลือก จะได้รับเงินเดือน สวัสดิการและผลตอบแทนต่างๆที่ดีพร้อมทั้งโอกาสที่จะเจริญเติบโต
 ก้าวหน้าในสายอาชีพ จากทางบริษัทฯ

qualification: {"Working at Thinking MachinesThinking Machines is a technology consultancy building AI & data platforms to solve high-impact problems for our clients. Our vision is for Southeast Asia to become a global hub for data science. To do that, we create data cultures one organization at a time.We’re a company made up of intellectually curious, civic-minded, forever-learning individuals. We believe that great data science products are built with care for people and that the best way to drive inclusive innovation is to start with a diverse team.Our field of work is incredibly dynamic, so we want to work with people who are committed to growing with us. We want to hire people who can demonstrate an ability to learn, then provide them with personalized coaching, growth opportunities, and a great working environment to get them to world-class.Role DescriptionData science ain’t data science without data. As a data engineer, you will collect and consolidate data from various sources, secure them, and transform them into useful forms so that you and your team can work data science magic on them. From a security perspective, we work with many confidential datasets, you will build pipelines that securely take confidential datasets from one point to another.You will be responsible for building systems for collecting, transforming, and storing data. This can range from writing a short script that periodically calls an API to creating a website scraper to architecting and building a complete data collection and data warehousing system.On a normal day, you might be architecting an analytics platform for a SaaS company, debugging a data ETL pipeline for an international NGO, and optimizing then deploying a machine learning model to TensorFlow mobile. We understand that dealing with corporations of various sizes can be quite complex. As a company dedicated to our clients, we're also seeking a customer-centric problem solver committed to their success.You'll be expected to help out on any tasks that may come up in any department. Since the startup space can get crazy, we are looking for someone who is up for any kind of challenge and has the initiative to seek out ways to be useful. We move fast, and we expect you to keep up!RequirementsWe’re looking for someone who meets the following profile:Enjoys coding - You must be very comfortable with writing and explaining code.Security paranoid - Handling client data is part of our daily job. We have security guidelines and protocols in place but a single blunder can cost huge damage.Makes things fast - Time is our most precious resource. Build things fast to find out how (or how not) to solve a problem.Strong Communication skills - You'll often translate complex technical concepts to internal stakeholders and external clients of varying technical backgrounds and skill levels. The skill to adapt your communications is key.\xa0Documentation skills - Besides coding, you will be required to document your code, including creating technical documentation in the form of manuals, proposals, guidelines, and other relevant materials.Initiative - Sometimes, the team won’t know that they need you. You need to be aware of the projects people are working on and support them when applicable. You don’t need to know how to use/fix the printer.Qualifications and CompetenciesProficient in speaking, writing, and comprehending Thai & English Language.A minimum of 2 years work experience in a relevant software engineering roleMust be proficient in at least one programming language (preferably Python). Knowing more is a bonus. Knowing too many but all poorly will make our eyes roll.More bonus points if you know how to handle data that doesn’t fit your machine’s RAM.SQL proficiency required (Postgres is our favorite flavor of RDBMS).We don’t manage a fleet of servers but you should know how to get around and manage various environments (especially IaaS such as AWS and Google Cloud). You’ll pique our interest if you love MS Azure.We do a huge amount of work on the Google stack. Big points if you’re comfortable with BigQuery, Dataflow, TensorFlow, and all that.Benefits and PerksWe offer the following compensation and benefits:Competitive salary — the compensation amount is positively correlated with the difficulty of the job, relevant experience, fit, and skill factors.Fully remote — due to the global pandemic, we have shifted to a fully remote company for the foreseeable future.\xa0 With the exception of required in-person days for community building and a managed number of client meetings, we work from where we choose.Individual professional development budget— an annual budget for conferences, training courses, books, and software is available to sharpen your skills and build new ones to help you grow in your role.Full health benefits — generous health insurance package upon hiring.Regular 1:1 meetings with the leadership team to discuss career and personal goals, job progress, and any questions and concerns.": "Enjoys coding - You must be very comfortable with writing and explaining code.Security paranoid - Handling client data is part of our daily job. We have security guidelines and protocols in place but a single blunder can cost huge damage.Makes things fast - Time is our most precious resource. Build things fast to find out how (or how not) to solve a problem.Strong Communication skills - You'll often translate complex technical concepts to internal stakeholders and external clients of varying technical backgrounds and skill levels. The skill to adapt your communications is key.\xa0Documentation skills - Besides coding, you will be required to document your code, including creating technical documentation in the form of manuals, proposals, guidelines, and other relevant materials.Initiative - Sometimes, the team won’t know that they need you. You need to be aware of the projects people are working on and support them when applicable. You don’t need to know how to use/fix the printer.", 'Working at Thinking Machines': 'Proficient in speaking, writing, and comprehending Thai & English Language.A minimum of 2 years work experience in a relevant software engineering roleMust be proficient in at least one programming language (preferably Python). Knowing more is a bonus. Knowing too many but all poorly will make our eyes roll.More bonus points if you know how to handle data that doesn’t fit your machine’s RAM.SQL proficiency required (Postgres is our favorite flavor of RDBMS).We don’t manage a fleet of servers but you should know how to get around and manage various environments (especially IaaS such as AWS and Google Cloud). You’ll pique our interest if you love MS Azure.We do a huge amount of work on the Google stack. Big points if you’re comfortable with BigQuery, Dataflow, TensorFlow, and all that.', 'Requirements': 'Competitive salary — the compensation amount is positively correlated with the difficulty of the job, relevant experience, fit, and skill factors.Fully remote — due to the global pandemic, we have shifted to a fully remote company for the foreseeable future.\xa0 With the exception of required in-person days for community building and a managed number of client meetings, we work from where we choose.Individual professional development budget— an annual budget for conferences, training courses, books, and software is available to sharpen your skills and build new ones to help you grow in your role.Full health benefits — generous health insurance package upon hiring.Regular 1:1 meetings with the leadership team to discuss career and personal goals, job progress, and any questions and concerns.'}

company_overview:
We started out as an IT unit of Tri Petch Isuzu Sales Co., Ltd. (Subsidiary company within Mitsubishi Corporation-Japan)

In 1990 MC Software Co., Ltd. was established as a subsidiary company under Tri Petch Isuzu Sales Co., Ltd. with the main purpose of providing total IT
 services for the companies. We have grown from a company of 15 employees with the sales volume of US$200K, to a company now employing 144 employees and grossing US$ 300 million.

From now we are 20th years anniversary in the Thai market, we have helped number of our clients created innovative business models by using IT.

With this readiness, in January 2002, we changed our company name to
Tri Petch IT Solutions Co., Ltd. Our objective is to expand our business and
 extend-our business with IT expertise to the customers not only within the group but also general company as well.

Working Tri Petch IT Solutions Co., Ltd – Style Working with Tri Petch IT Solutions Co., Ltd 
Tri Petch IT Solutions Co., Ltd is a leading SI company,
 and we are proud to be part of successful in IT business. 
Tri Petch IT Solutions Co., Ltd is working in team and sharing new experience
 in training. We are working hard and looking for a bright future. Good team player is a key achieve to the company goal.

Benefit 
1. Bonus

2. Health
 Insurance 
3. Provident
 fund 7.5% 
4. Life
 insurance

 (computer and car) 
6. Gym

 rewards

 trip

 Activities

qualification: {'Junior Business Analyst / System Analyst (Insurance Tech)Location: Bangkok BTS LineCathcart Technology is now coordinating with a leading insurance company that is expanding its internal tech development team enhancing the core system and other related digital platforms. company_overview:
Cathcart Technology is an agile and independent technology recruitment consultancy headquartered in the UK. Since our establishment in 2009, the UK company was awarded with many recognitions
 and nominations. In 2015, we recognized a great opportunity for us to expand into the emerging technology market in Thailand. Ever since then, we are proud to say that we are playing a part in making Bangkok become one of the most important technology markets
 worldwide.
.
At Cathcart Technology, we specialize in sourcing and placing tech talents in a wide range of industries in Thailand, across a variety of business sectors from startups to enterprise organizations.
 As a boutique agency, we take immense pride in delivering highly professional and tailored services to both our valued clients and exceptional candidates.


Why choose us?

Expert Recruiters: 
Our team of experienced recruiters have a deep understanding of the Thai tech market and maintains a large database of highly qualified IT candidates.
Specialization:  With our specialization, strong work ethic, and years of experience, we are the best choice for matching the right talents with your organization and
 finding the ideal roles for our candidates. Extensive Resources:  We have invested heavily in our database and advertising reach to ensure that we have access to the best IT talents in Thailand to provide our
 clients with a competitive advantage to get ahead in the market. Streamlined Services:  We provide straightforward yet professional and effective services, throughout the recruitment process from start to finish.

Working and partnering with Cathcart Technology for seamless tech recruitment and thrive in the dynamic world of technology.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ 
Visit our website: https://cathcarttechnology.co.th

Cathcart Technology Thailand
Facebook : Cathcart Technology

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), DBA, IT Consulting
company_overview:
ATA IT Ltd. (National Bank of Canada Group) established
 in Thailand on February 2016 will be acting as an “IT hub” or “IT center” for commercial banks and other companies in South East Asia and Pacific Ocean areas.

National Bank of Canada (BNC) is
 the major shareholder and parent company of ATA IT LIMITED. BNC is an integrated provider of financial services to retail, commercial, corporate and institutional clients.

National Bank is the leading bank in Quebec and the partner of choice for small and medium-sized enterprises. It is also the sixth
 largest bank in Canada with branches in almost every province. Clients in the United States, Europe and other parts of the world are served through a network of representative offices, subsidiaries and partnerships.

Its head office is located in Montreal and its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange.

With $232 billion in assets as at October 31, 2016, National Bank of Canada, together with its subsidiaries, forms one of Canada's
 leading integrated financial groups. The Bank has more than 21,000 employees and is widely recognized as a top employer. Its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX: NA). Follow the Bank's activities at nbc.ca or via social media such as Facebook,
 LinkedIn and Twitter.

ATA IT Limited offers the structure for professional growth, with the necessary support for full development of abilities, while valuing
 team work, leadership and commitment.

If you are looking for a challenging opportunity to develop yourself, to learn, and to achieve professional success, join us!
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Work from home, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

position: Officer or Engineer – Hydrology Engineering  (System Developer/Programmer)
job_highlight: SQL, PostgreSQL/Python, R, Java, C++/Power BI, Tableau
qualification: {"Summary of Responsibilities:\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 The System Developer/Programmer is responsible for the development and maintenance of software and systems that assist hydrological monitoring, forecasting, simulation models, data analysis/visualization, and operational efficiency in hydropower generation. The role also involves managing and updating hydrology-related databases, geospatial databases, as well as creating and maintaining websites to support these operations.Main Responsibilities:Develop, maintain, and enhance software systems to collect, analyze, and visualize hydrological, and geospatial data, sediment transport data for hydropower operations and optimization.Design and implement software solutions to improve safety and efficiency operations, water management, flood prediction, etc.Create and manage databases for hydrological, meteorological, geospatial, and hydropower-related data.Develop a website and dashboards for disseminating data.Work closely with hydrologists, civil engineers, and data scientists to translate scientific methods into software solutions or implement new features for software systems.Produce technical documentation, including software specifications, user manuals, and guidelines.Requirement:\xa0Bachelor's Degree or higher in computer science, information technology, engineering or related fields.3-5 years of experience in software development, particulary in areas related to hydrological forecasting system and water management.Experience in deta base management\xa0 system such as SQL or PostgreSQL.Familiarity with web development technologies, including HTML, CSS and JavaScript.Experience in preparation of technical report, progress report, manuals and guidelines.Programming language such as Python, R, Java, C++Data Visualization tools such as Tableau, Power BIUnderstanding cloud-based service such as AWS, Azure, Google cloud": 'Develop, maintain, and enhance software systems to collect, analyze, and visualize hydrological, and geospatial data, sediment transport data for hydropower operations and optimization.Design and implement software solutions to improve safety and efficiency operations, water management, flood prediction, etc.Create and manage databases for hydrological, meteorological, geospatial, and hydropower-related data.Develop a website and dashboards for disseminating data.Work closely with hydrologists, civil engineers, and data scientists to translate scientific methods into software solutions or implement new features for software systems.Produce technical documentation, including software specifications, user manuals, and guidelines.'}

CKpower จดทะเบียนจัดตั้งเมื่อวันที่ 8 มิถุนายน 2554 ด้วยวัตถุประสงค์ ให้เป็นบริษัทแกนนำของกลุ่ม ช.การช่าง ที่มุ่งเน้นการลงทุน ในธุรกิจผลิตและจำหน่ายไฟฟ้าจากพลังงานประเภทต่างๆ โดยบริษัทประกอบธุรกิจหลักโดยการถือหุ้นในบริษัทอื่น (Holding Company) ที่ประกอบธุรกิจผลิตและจำหน่ายไฟฟ้าจากพลังงานประเภทต่างๆ
 ซึ่งบริษัทมีรายได้หลักจากเงินปันผลรับจากการลงทุนถือหุ้นในบริษัทย่อยและบริษัทร่วม 
ปัจจุบันบริษัทลงทุนในบริษัทที่ประกอบธุรกิจผลิตและจำหน่ายไฟฟ้าจำนวน 6 บริษัทในโครงการไฟฟ้า 3 ประเภท ได้แก่ โครงการไฟฟ้าพลังน้ำ โครงการไฟฟ้าระบบโคเจนเนอเรชั่น และโครงการไฟฟ้าพลังแสงอาทิตย์
โดย CKP มีความยินดีเปิดรับผู้มีความสามารถและประสบการณ์เข้าร่วมเป็นทีมงานคุณภาพกับเรา เพื่อรองรับความเติบโตอย่างต่อเนื่องและความมั่นคงที่ยั่งยืนในอนาคต

company_overview:
บริษัท แสนสิริ จำกัด (มหาชน) และบริษัทในเครือ - บริษัท พลัส พร็อพเพอร์ตี้ จำกัด - บริษัท ทัช พร็อพเพอร์ตี้ จำกัด  
 - บริษัท พิวรรธนา จำกัด - บริษัท แสนสิริ แลนด์ จำกัด - ฯลฯ  บริษัททีพัฒนาการที่ไม่หยุดนิ่งรวมถึงการเป็นผู้ริเริ่มและนำแนวคิดใหม่มาใช้ในการสร้างสรรค์ผลงานคุณภาพเพื่อสังคมที่ดีในวันนี้และวันหน้า และในการรักษามาตรฐานการดำเนินงานให้มีประสิทธิภาพอย่างต่อเนื่อง
 บริษัทฯ มุ่งที่จะรักษาและพัฒนาบุคลากรให้มีคุณภาพ พร้อมด้วยการจัดสวัสดิการที่เพียบพร้อม เพื่อรองรับการขยายตัวในการดำเนินงานอย่างไม่หยุดยั้ง บริษัท แสนสิริ จำกัด (มหาชน) ต้องการบุคลากรที่มีความรู้ ความสามารถมาร่วมสร้างสรรค์ผลงานคุณภาพ และพร้อมที่จะเติบโตก้าวหน้าไปพร้อมกับเรา
 ดังนี้

บริษัท แสนสิริ จำกัด (มหาชน) หนึ่งในผู้นำธุรกิจการพัฒนาอสังหาริมทรัพย์ของประเทศไทยที่มีผลงานอันโดดเด่น ทั้งด้านงานพัฒนาโครงการอสังหาริมทรัพย์ บริหารอาคาร บริหารงานขาย บริการที่ปรึกษาการลงทุน บริการตรวจสอบอาคาร บริการด้านเครื่องใช้ไฟฟ้าและเครื่องปรับอากาศ

 goals. We are committed to making REAL change by shifting banking paradigm through combined expertise and core strengths of both banks.

 new initiatives to deliver best customer experiences. We look for candidate who believe in integrity, portrait challenge status quo attitude, work agile, show respect towards others, and value high quality on execution. TMBThanachart Bank (ttb),
 where you can BE YOUR BEST.

job_highlight: Privacy and Compliance/Experience in IT Security/Information Security Procedures
job_desc: {'Job Summary:': ['Security Policy Development: Develop and implement IT security policies, standards, and procedures to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of data.'], 'Key Responsibilities:': ['Risk Assessment: Conduct regular risk assessments and security audits to identify vulnerabilities and provide recommendations for improvement.'], 'Qualifications:': ['Incident Response: Manage and respond to security incidents and breaches, including incident detection, analysis, and resolution.']}
qualification: {"Job Summary:We are seeking an experienced IT Security Specialist to join our fintech team. The IT Security Specialist will play a crucial role in safeguarding our systems, data, and operations from cyber threats and ensuring compliance with industry regulations. If you are a dedicated professional with a strong background in IT security and a passion for fintech, we want to hear from you.Key Responsibilities:Security Policy Development: Develop and implement IT security policies, standards, and procedures to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of data.Risk Assessment: Conduct regular risk assessments and security audits to identify vulnerabilities and provide recommendations for improvement.Incident Response: Manage and respond to security incidents and breaches, including incident detection, analysis, and resolution.Access Control: Implement and manage access control measures, including user access, authentication, authorization, and encryption.Network Security: Configure and monitor network security measures, such as firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and VPNs.Compliance: Ensure compliance with industry-specific regulations and standards, and other relevant financial regulations.Security Training: Provide security awareness training to employees and promote a security-conscious culture within the organization.Security Tools: Select, deploy, and manage security tools and technologies to protect the organization's IT infrastructure.Security Monitoring: Monitor and analyze security logs and events to identify and respond to security threats.Vulnerability Management: Identify and remediate vulnerabilities in systems, applications, and infrastructure.Security Documentation: Maintain up-to-date documentation of security policies, procedures, and incident reports.Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Information Security, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's degree preferred).Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP), Certified Information Security Manager (CISM), or similar certifications preferred.Proven experience in IT security, especially in a fintech or financial services environment.Strong understanding of financial industry regulations and compliance requirements.Experience with security tools and technologies, including firewalls, intrusion detection systems, and antivirus software.Knowledge of encryption, PKI, and secure data transmission protocols.Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.Strong communication and interpersonal skills.Ability to work independently and as part of a team.Detail-oriented and highly organized.": 'Security Policy Development: Develop and implement IT security policies, standards, and procedures to ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of data.'}

เอไอเอ เริ่มดำเนินธุรกิจในประเทศไทย ตั้งแต่ พ.ศ. 2481 ตลอดหลายทศวรรษที่ผ่านมา เอไอเอ มุ่งมั่นที่จะมอบความคุ้มครองที่ครอบคลุมความต้องการของลูกค้าบุคคลและองค์กร
 ผ่านบริการและผลิตภัณฑ์ที่หลากหลาย อาทิ ผลิตภัณฑ์ประกันชีวิต ประกันอุบัติเหตุ ประกันสุขภาพ ประกันกลุ่ม ประกันสินเชื่อ และให้บริการเป็นผู้จัดการกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ
ปัจจุบัน กว่า 1 ใน 3 ของกรมธรรม์ประกันชีวิตในประเทศไทยเป็นของเอไอเอ1 บริษัทมีพลังตัวแทนประกันชีวิตมากกว่า
 60,000 คน กระจายอยู่ทั่วประเทศและให้บริการลูกค้ากว่า 5.5 ล้านคน ด้วยจำนวนกรมธรรม์กว่า 8,000,000 ฉบับ นอกจากนี้ เอไอเอ ยังเป็นบริษัทประกันชีวิตชั้นนำที่ริเริ่มใช้แอปพลิเคชันต่างๆ เช่น iPoS+ และ AIA iService เพื่อสนับสนุนการขายและให้บริการลูกค้าได้อย่างรวดเร็วและครบวงจร
 อีกทั้งยังมียอดขายผลิตภัณฑ์ยูนิต ลิงค์2 และจำนวนตัวแทนประกันชีวิตที่ได้รับอนุญาต IC License สูงสุด3
เอไอเอ เป็นบริษัทที่ “เข้าใจชีวิต เข้าใจคุณ” เพราะเรายึดมั่นในการส่งเสริมให้ผู้คนมีคุณภาพชีวิตที่ดี
 มีสุขภาพแข็งแรง และมีอายุยืนยาว อีกทั้งยังมุ่งมั่นในการตอบแทนสังคมอย่างแท้จริงผ่านโครงการเพื่อสังคมต่างๆ เช่น โครงการทำดีร่วมกัน (เอไอเอ แชร์ริ่ง อะ ไลฟ์ เดย์) โครงการห้องสมุดเอไอเอ โครงการเอไอเอ สร้างรอยยิ้ม และโครงการเอไอเอ ก้าวใหม่ ชีวิตใหม่ เป็นต้น
1.ข้อมูลจากรายงานของคปภ. เรื่อง "จำนวนกรมธรรม์และจำนวนเงินเอาประกันภัยของธรุกิจประกันชีวิต ประจำเดือนมกราคม - เดือนตุลาคม 2558
2. ข้อมูลจากรายงานของคปภ.เรื่อง “รายงานการรับประกันชีวิตจำแนกตามช่องทางการขาย ประจำเดือน มกราคม - ตุลาคม 2558”
3. สถิติจำนวนนักวิเคราะห์การลงทุน จากเว็บไซต์ของสำนักงานคณะกรรมการกำกับหลักทรัพย์และตลาดหลักทรัพย์ ปรับปรุงล่าสุด 25 มกราคม 2559 

About AIA Thailand
Established in Thailand since 1938, AIA has been committed to providing protection coverage to both individuals and businesses through a wide variety of products and services, including life
 insurance, personal accident, health insurance, group insurance, credit life insurance and provident fund management services.
Currently, approximately 1 out every 3 life insurance policies in Thailand is written by AIA1. With
 more than 60,000 agents nationwide, we service over 5.5 million customers with
 over 8 million in-force policies. Leading
 thelife insurance industry, AIA pioneers iPOS+ &
 AIA iService applicationsfor sales and customer support to ensure prompt and first-rate
 service standards. Besides, AIA achieves the highest number of unit linked sales2 and
 IC-licensed agents3.
As “The Real Life Company”, AIA is strongly committed to making people live longer, healthier and better lives. We
 aim to make a real difference to our community through a number of corporate social responsibility initiatives, for instance AIA Sharing A Life Day, AIA School Library, AIA Operation Smile, AIA New Legs New Life, and so on.  
1. Data
 from OIC's report “NUMBER OF POLICIES AND SUM INSURED OF LIFE INSURANCE BUSINESS AT THE JANUARY - OCTOBER
 IN 2015”
2. Data
 from OIC's life insurance distribution channels report, January - October
 2015
3. Statistics
 of active investment analysts, from website of The Securities and Exchange Commission, last updated 25 January 2016

company_overview:
บริษัท เอสซี แอสเสท คอร์ปอเรชั่น จำกัด (มหาชน) ผู้พัฒนาอสังหาริมทรัพย์ชั้นนำ ในตลาดหลักทรัพย์แห่งประเทศไทย
 ตั้งแต่ปี 2561 เราได้ปรับเปลี่ยนตัวเองเป็น Living Solutions Provider โดยมุ่งมั่น พัฒนาภายใต้แนวคิดที่มีมนุษย์เป็นศูนย์กลาง พัฒนาที่อยู่อาศัย ส่งมอบสินค้าและบริการ ที่มีคุณภาพเชื่อถือได้ เต็มไปด้วยความใส่ใจและยั่งยืนเพื่อเช้าวันใหม่ที่ดีของทุกคน

job_functions: Professional Services, Business Analysis / Data Analysis, Information Technology (IT), Application Specialist - Software, Programming / Software Development
company_overview:
Bangkok Komatsu Sales Co.,Ltd. (BKS)
was established as a joint venture of Komatsu Limited (Japan) and Bangkok Motor Works Co., Ltd. (in Siam Motors Group of companies). We are the distributor of the world renowned construction and mining equipment brand KOMATSU in Thailand. Our main
 products are Hydraulic Excavators, Bull Dozers, Wheel Loaders, Motor Graders and Dump Trucks.

According to our business expansion, now we are seeking for the high caliber candidate to join our team.
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Free shuttle bus, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Overtime pay, Performance bonus, Travel allowance, Five-day work week

job_highlight: DevOps, Technology Infrastructure, Data Warehouse/API, Full Stack Development, Cloud Computing/AWS, GCP
job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Programming / Software Development
company_overview:
Charoen Pokphand Group Co., Ltd, a leading company in Thailand, serves as a parent company of C.P. Group. As a holding company, Charoen Pokphand Group Co., Ltd. holds
 shares of subsidiaries in Thailand and overseas. The Group operates across many industries ranging from industrial to service.

With decades of industry leadership across multiple regions, we are recognized as a global leader and innovator in the food business. Our priority is to ensure the highest level of quality
 and safety in every product.

The key to our success lies in our ability to control end-to-end process that meets international standards. We start by using safe, trusted, and traceable materials to manufacture high-quality
 feed products for our animals. Then we combine advanced technology and research to raise a variety of animals such as chicken, duck, swine, shrimp, and fish in hygienic conditions. This produces the highest quality of meat selection to be processed into tasty,
 ready-to-eat meals for consumers worldwide.

We have also expanded our businesses to several areas which include retail, telecommunication and media, e-commerce and digital, property development, plastics, automotive, finance and insurance,
 and pharmaceutical.
company_benefits_incentives: Life insurance, Medical insurance, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

qualification: {'General Purpose of the Position:Network Engineer will monitor the health monitoring and event investigation of the customer and internal connectivity services/infrastructure. This position is also responsible for providing customer service technical support. By working closely with Senior Network Engineer, this position will configure, deploy, maintain and provide documentation of the network infrastructure as well as be part of escalation.Supervisory Responsibilities:There are no supervisory responsibilities.Essential Duties and Responsibilities:Troubleshoot and resolve customer tickets. Works closely with the customer or with the vendor until resolution.Create and maintain diagrams and technical documents.Participate in IT projects and effectively meet deadlines with minimum supervision.Provide input and feedback for the use and optimization of internal network/system management, NOC processes, and procedures.In the event of a critical situation or major service outage, will perform crisis management. This includes activating a conference bridge and coordinating with a cross-functional team in English.Internal IT support for related IT equipment, data center network, and system infrastructure.\xa0Other Duties:Required to work on the day and night shiftsRequired to work a flexible schedule/on-call rota according to business needs/events.Physical DemandsOther duties assignedRequired Job Skills:Able to read, write and communicate well in EnglishExcellent oral and written communication and interpersonal skills. Must be able to accurately communicate complex issues using easy-to-understand terminology.Ability to interact with staff (at all levels) in a fast-paced environment, sometimes under pressure, company_overview:
MOTIVATED BY INVENTION. DRIVEN BY PERFECTION.
SUPERNAP Thailand marks SUPERNAP International’s presence in Asia Pacific with the purpose of designing and building data center ecosystems in Thailand based on the design
 of the state-of-the-art, multi-tenant, Tier IV-rated SUPERNAP Data Center technology from Nevada, USA. SUPERNAP Data Centers are certified as the highest-ranking multi-tenant colocation data centers in the world and are maintained by the highest-rated mission
 critical operations teams. SUPERNAP is the recognized world leader in colocation design, development and mission critical operations.
The SUPERNAP Thailand Data Center, is set to play a key role in developing Thailand’s presence as a serious Asia Pacific Data Center hub. In addition, the facility will play
 a key role in supporting the government’s commitment to build a highly available, secure and quality data center facility to support Thailand’s digital economy. SUPERNAP Thailand offers unparalleled added value, thanks to advanced services that the company
 can offer to a large number of clients, generating advantages and benefits for the entire community and ecosystem. The centralization of outsourced services will bring a reduction in energy consumption, reduced space needs which all translates into savings
 and less impact on the environment
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus

company_overview:
ARK Insights Co., Ltd.
Headquartered in Singapore, Ark Insights (Thailand) is a pioneer specializing in Contact Center Outsourcing.
The Call Center is at the heart of your business, so it is essential that you are able to eliminate downtime whilst boosting performance at all times. We recognize that a good
 design is simply not enough on its own and that the hard work really begins when you start using our facility.
Building on the knowledge and expertise within our business that comes from almost 30 years of operating within the marketplace, our Data Center Facilities Management (DCFM) team
 delivers a scalable and professional range of services aimed solely at providing critical data center solutions.
Ark Insights Center Facilities Management is designed to meet the challenges of maintaining, operating and managing complex and high performing data/voice centers now and in the
 future.
Underpinned by Call Center specific and fully integrated tools and software our systems and processes support the key elements of critical facilities management throughout the
 lifecycle of your Center.
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Transportation allowance, Travel allowance, Work from home, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

Depth First Co., Ltd. was founded on February 2003, with the aid of 2nd series incubator project of Dr. Veerasak Sungthavorn in Software Park in order to be the professional company providing program and website development services with JAVA program (JAVA
 Expert) and also provides the best solutions to support the online businesses and other related businesses of domestic and oversea companies.

 Management.
Online
 Database Management

company_overview:
Krungsri is a strategic member of MUFG Bank, Ltd. (MUFG Bank), a wholly-owned subsidiary of Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG) – Japan’s
 largest financial group and one of the world’s financial groups with the most varied financial services and products. As of the end of 2018, the Bank’s registered capital totaled 75,741 million baht, while our paid-up capital reached 73,558 million baht. Krungsri
 is Thailand’s fifth largest commercial bank in terms of assets, loans, and deposits.
We are passionate about meeting and acquiring talents. No matter who you are, gender, race, age, religion; We embrace all differences
 and diversity. Door of opportunities at Krungsri family are open for everyone who are looking to challenge themselves regardless of individual differences by using their best endeavors to achieve excellence and mutual success with us. That is our Krungsri
 DNA.
At Krungsri, employees are also considered as key stakeholders and valuable resources of the Bank. They play vital roles in driving the
 organization towards business targets and the organization is unlikely to achieve stability if its employees lack development. The Bank’s employees are also essential indicators of its directions and successes in the future.

company_overview:
eCloudvalley is a born-in-the-cloud Premier Tier Services Partner of Amazon Web Services(AWS). This is the highest tier for partners and our expertise focuses
 entirely on AWS services, such as next generation managed services, cloud migration, and data & analytics. We are one of the largest AWS partners worldwide. We have over 2000+ enterprise customers and obtained
 over 680 AWS professional certifications, a huge testament to the reliability and practicality of our solutions.
eCloudvalley is a fast-growing company, starting AWS business at the beginning of 2014 and obtained the status of AWS Managed Service Provider Partner in 2016.
In 2017, eCloudvalley became the very first AWS Premier Consulting Partner in the Greater China Region (GCR) and acquired certifications of ISO 27001 and ISO 27017. In the same year, we obtained the status of AWS Authorized Training
 Partner and started to provide a well-organized AWS learning path for our customers. Then, we also passed AWS DevOps Competency, AWS Security Competency, AWS SAP Competency, AWS Data & Analytics Competency, and AWS Mobile Competency, etc. With all these competencies
 audited by AWS, eCloudvalley cloud solutions are proved to be effective and reliable. Moreover, eCloudvalley is one of the notable vendors in the Asia Pacific Representative Vendors of Public Cloud MSP recognized by Gartner in 2022 and 2020.
eCloudvalley has committed to digitalize with cloud since our first day of business. We have committed to evolve our technology skills and continue to provide intelligent, automated managed services for our customers.
Core Expertise of eCloudvalley Technology 

Cloud Migration (Server/VM/SAP/DB) Next Generation Managed Services Big Data and Analytics Development on AWS DevOps and Microservices Cybersecurity 
Why eCloudvalley?
At eCloudvalley Technology, it's not just about work; it's about being part of a thriving community dedicated to revolutionizing cloud technology. Joining our team means becoming a valued member of a global family, united by a shared
 passion for innovation and excellence. Here at eCloudvalley, talents will have the chance to cultivate their career, contribute to cutting-edge solutions, and leave a lasting mark on the world of cloud technology.
Our Hiring Culture
At eCloudvalley Technology, we hold Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) as integral pillars of our identity. We recognize the transformative power that comes with embracing diversity, and we leverage on our position as a leading
 global cloud innovator to drive positive social change.
As an employer, we are resolutely dedicated to fostering an inclusive environment, guided by the belief that it is both morally right and pivotal for our success. This commitment translates into tangible benefits - it enhances our
 business performance and cultivates a company culture where every team member feels not only welcome and safe, but also valued and respected. This way, our employees can wholeheartedly focus on their work, free from the shackles of prejudice or discrimination.
We labor diligently to establish a robust DEI foundation that permeates every level of our company. In doing so, we pave the way for the next generation of leaders, ensuring that opportunities for growth and advancement are accessible
 across every dimension of diversity.
We firmly assert that everyone has a place in the world of cloud technology. Recognizing that diversity is not just a cornerstone of our culture but also a driving force behind our business achievements, we are broadening our aspirations
 to mirror the communities we serve. Our goal is to make eCloudvalley Technology a space where all individuals can not only flourish but also thrive, contributing to a more equal, equitable future.

company_overview:
KONICA MINOLTA BUSINESS SOLUTIONS (THAILAND) Co.,Ltd., is the subsidiary of Konica Minolta Incorporation (Japan) who do have the outstanding expertise in Printing technology
 for more than 100 years. We have been providing the wide range of both office printing products and production printing products together with the software solutions for various businesses and industries.

Our mission is to provide all customers with good products quality services, and together with appropriate application solutions of office document management and production printing management
 in order to maximize the most benefits and satisfaction for all customers in both office work and the digital printing industries.

Due to our business expansion, we are looking for enthusiastic, positive thinking, accountable, engaged, self-motivated and entrepreneurial minded person to create a new era of success with
 us.
บริษัท โคนิก้า มินอลต้า บิสสิเนส โซลูชันส์ (ประเทศไทย) จำกัด หนึ่งในสาขาของบริษัท โคนิก้า มินอลต้าประเทศญี่ปุ่น ที่มีความเชี่ยวชาญและโดดเด่นในด้านเทคโนโลยีการพิมพ์มานานกว่า
 100 ปี เรามีการให้บริการที่หลากหลายของทั้งในด้านของผลิตภัณฑ์การพิมพ์สำนักงานและผลิตภัณฑ์การผลิตงานพิมพ์ ซึ่งมีระบบรองรับครอบคลุมในทุกธุรกิจและอุตสาหกรรม

ภารกิจของเราคือการให้ลูกค้าได้ใช้ผลิตภัณฑ์ที่ดี การบริการที่มีคุณภาพและไปจนถึงการประยุกต์ระบบการใช้งานที่เหมาะสมในด้านการจัดการงานพิมพ์เอกสารสำนักงาน และงานพิมพ์การผลิตให้เกิดประโยชน์ และความพึงพอใจสูงสุดของลูกค้า
 ทั้งในงานสำนักงานและงานอุตสาหกรรมการพิมพ์
จากการขยายตัวทางธุรกิจของเรา เรากำลังมองหาผู้ที่มีความกระตือรือร้น, มีทัศนะคติเชิงบวก, มีความรับผิดชอบสูง, มีความคิดสร้างสรรค์, มีความมุ่งมั่นและมีจิตวิญญาณของผู้ประกอบการ มาร่วมสร้างความสำเร็จไปด้วยกันกับเรา

company_overview:
Toyota Leasing (Thailand) Co., Ltd. - TLT

We are an affiliate of Toyota Financial Services Corporation (TFSC) in Nagoya, Japan.

Since 1994, we have been providing automotive financial services to Toyota customers and dealers nationwide with an extensive range of financial products and services
 designed to meet customers’ unique needs.

We now have more than 1,200 associates working in all regions to support our customers to own Toyota vehicle of choice with reliable and convenient services. We
 commit to offer the higher quality of services and ensure that our company and business will sustainably contribute to Thailand community and economy.

Now, we are seeking for new generation to join and be the important part of the company to drive our business and enhance the capability to satisfy Toyota customers.

Toyota Leasing offers the equal career advancement, extensive training and development courses, plus attractive remuneration package to the selected candidates as
 follows:

Group life insurance, group medical insurance, performance-based bonus and merit increment, dental and optical care allowance, vehicle-financing scheme for associates,
 and etc.

Please come and join our growing organization !
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Overtime pay, Performance bonus, Flexible working hours

company_overview:
Overview
SIG is a leading systems and solutions provider for aseptic packaging. We work in partnership with our customers to bring food products to consumers around
 the world in a safe, sustainable and affordable way. Our unique technology and outstanding innovation capacity enable us to provide our customers with end-to-end solutions for differentiated products, smarter factories and connected packs, all to address the
 ever-changing needs of consumers. Founded 1853, SIG is headquartered in Neuhausen, Switzerland. The skills and experience of our approximately 5,000 employees worldwide enable us to respond quickly and effectively to the needs of our customers in over 60 countries.
 In 2021, SIG generated €2.05 billion in revenue.
For more information, visit www.sig.biz The owner and operator of this job portal page is SIG Combibloc Ltd ("SIG”). Website
 : http://www.sig.biz 
Headquarters : Neuhausen am Rheinfall, Neuhausen am Rheinfall
_____________________________________________________

Recruitment Privacy Notice
For
SIG Combibloc Limited(the “Company”) to assess
 your job application, please study this Recruitment Privacy Notice (the “Notice”) in detail before providing your personal data to the Company. The Company commits to implementing a standardized personal data security measure of your personal
 data in strict compliance with the relevant laws.
Personal Data being processed
During the recruitment process, the Company may collect and/or receive your personal data (i) directly from you as provided
 in the application form, your resume or as given by you to the Company from conversations or interviews; (ii) from recruitment agencies or any referrers that you may have given consent to them to disclose your personal data related to your job application
 or job experience to the Company for the purpose of applying for a job position; (iii) from any third party that you have indicated as your reference person that the Company can contact them for your additional information.
By filling in the application form and during the interviewing process,
 the Company needs to collect your personal data which may include your general information i.e., full name, identification card number, contact information, educational background, work experience, interest or skill as well as any other verification document,
 and for some positions, it may include your health (such as medical condition) and disability information (if related and the consent has been granted from the applicant).
Once you have passed the selection process by interviewing,it
 is necessary for the Company to collect additional sensitive personal data
 from the applicant, including criminal record information and health check information, which may include hearing test data. The
Company will request consent from the applicant under the relevant legal framework.However,
 the Company is
necessary to inform the applicant that for some positions, all personal data
 is considered and that it is imperative for the Company to consider the qualifications
 and suitability of the applicant.
Objectives of Processing the Personal Data
The Company needs to collect, compile and process your personal data for the following purposes: (i) to verify your identity
 including the accuracy of the information that you have given to the Company; (ii) to assess your qualification and suitability for the position that you have applied for; (iii) to contact you during the recruitment process; and (iv) to contact you in case
 that the Company may have vacant and suitable positions for you in the future. 
Unless the applicant expresses the intention to exercise the right for the
Company to delete or destroy personal
data
immediately, the
Company reserves the right to retain all personal
data of the applicant for an additional period of [6 months] even if the applicant
 has not been selected as an employee of the Company.
Disclosure of the Personal Data
Generally, your personal data will not be disclosed or shared to any person except in the circumstances that the Company would
 need to disclose and/or transfer your personal data for the benefit of the recruitment process to the following persons: (i) third party service provider which provides background check or is engaged to provide any related recruitment services for the Company;
 (ii) any Company’s affiliates that may have suitable positions in which you may be interested; (iii) any reference person that the Company may need to share your personal data in order to check your job experience; and (iv) other third parties to whom the
 applicant has given consent to the Company to disclose personal data to such persons.
Your Rights as a Data Subject
The Company respects your right as the data subject under the relevant laws and you shall be entitled to contact the company
 to exercise your statutory rights, including the right to withdraw consent; the right to access and request for copies of your personal data; the right to rectify; the right to data portability; the right to object to the personal data process; the right to
 request for deletion, destruction, or de-identification of your personal data when there is no necessity to process; the right to request for suspension of the use of Personal Data; or the right to file a complaint in the case of a violation of your personal
 data processing. You can contact the Company for any query or the exercise of any rights at: 591  UBC II Building, 22nd Floor,Soi Sukhumvit 33,  Sukhumvit Road,Klong Tan Nuea, Wattana, Bangkok 10110

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), IT Project Management / Team Lead, IT Consulting
company_overview:
บริษัท RTS2003 เป็นเป็นผู้ให้บริการ System Integrator (SI) ที่มุ่งสร้างความเชื่อมโยงระหว่างเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและเทคโนโลยีโทรคมนาคม เพื่อสร้างสรรค์สิ่งใหม่ๆ และพัฒนาธุรกิจให้ก้าวหน้าตามเทคโนโลยีที่กำลังเติบโตอย่างรวดเร็วในสมัยนี้
 บริษัทฯ มุ่งมั่นที่จะเป็นผู้นำทางด้านการบูรณาการระบบและการให้บริการที่มีคุณภาพสูงให้กับลูกค้า โดยการนำเอาเทคโนโลยีที่ทันสมัยและสถาปัตยกรรมที่ยืดหยุ่นมาประยุกต์ใช้ในการพัฒนาโซลูชันที่สอดคล้องกับความต้องการของลูกค้า 
โดยก่อตั้งขึ้นในปี 2003 และมีทุนจดทะเบียนทั้งหมด 100 ล้านบาท โดยธุรกิจของบริษัทถูกแบ่งออกเป็น 2 ประเภทหลัก คือ เทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศ และ เทคโนโลยีโทรคมนาคม โดยโดยมุ่งเน้นให้บริการแก่ลูกค้าที่เป็นหน่วยงานภาครัฐและรัฐวิสาหกิจ 
 ให้บริการและสนับสนุนลูกค้าในการพัฒนาและบูรณาการระบบเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและโทรคมนาคมที่เหมาะสมกับความต้องการและความสำเร็จของธุรกิจของลูกค้าในยุคดิจิทัลที่เปลี่ยนแปลงอย่างรวดเร็ว 
เรามีความมุ่งมั่นที่จะเป็นผู้นำทางด้านการบูรณาการระบบเทคโนโลยีสารสนเทศและโทรคมนาคมในตลาดภาครัฐและรัฐวิสาหกิจ พร้อมทั้งพัฒนาและนำเทคโนโลยีที่ทันสมัยมาใช้ประโยชน์ในการพัฒนาธุรกิจของลูกค้า เรายินดีที่จะสร้างความเชื่อมโยงและความร่วมมือกับลูกค้าและพันธมิตรทางธุรกิจเพื่อให้ได้รับผลประโยชน์ที่สูงสุดอย่างมีความยั่งยืนจากเทคโนโลยีและการพัฒนาธุรกิจในยุคดิจิทัลที่เติบโตอย่างรวดเร็วในปัจจุบัน
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Medical insurance, Overtime pay, Performance bonus, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

company_overview:
Krungthai-AXA Life Insurance Public Company Limited 
Krungthai-AXA is a perfect combination of Krungthai Bank Plc., a commercial bank of the Thai Government, and the AXA Group, one of the world leading Insurance. We aim to satisfy both clients and employees. Our mission is to help people and economies grow.
 With 149,000 employees & distributors of AXA Group. We have the international reach, experience and imagination it takes to bring the best financial protection and wealth management to 95 million clients worldwide. Our commitment is to satisfy our clients
 by providing high standard services that are highly suited to the needs of today’s Thai people.
“Krungthai-AXA Life is committed to promoting inclusion and diversity by creating a work environment where all employees are treated with dignity and respect and where individual differences are valued.”

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Application Specialist - Software, Programming / Software Development
company_overview:
HRnetOne is a leading talent acquisition firm in Asia, with operations
 in 15 growth cities. Since our inception in 1992, we have expanded organically within the professional recruitment industry.

We serve clients from diversified sectors, covering a wide spectrum of industries and functions.

Our growth has been driven by a solid infrastructure of systems and processes as well as its organisational culture that cultivates diligence, breakthrough
 performance, and integrity. 
HRnetOne is
 part of HRnetGroup and was listed on the Singapore Exchange in June 2017. In 2018, HRnetGroup won “The Enterprise Award” at the Singapore Business Awards, organised by The Business Times and DHL, in recognition of its profound influence on the recruitment
 scene in Singapore and the region.

job_desc: {'Responsibilities:': ['Lead the development and implementation of end-to-end technological solutions across various business functions.', 'Demonstrate proven expertise with SAP S/4HANA applications and other non-SAP applications, overseeing integration spanning functional modules connected to Big Data/Omni Commerce platforms and Retail system platforms.', 'Direct the development, implementation, and support of complex business processes in an SAP environment, emphasizing optimal and best practice technical solutions.', 'Enforce rigorous SAP Security IT General Controls and processes in accordance with organizational guidelines, conducting regular reviews to prevent violations.', 'Analyze key business metrics to identify opportunities for continuous improvement and risks, managing full SDLC cycles to strengthen both SAP and non-SAP solutions.', 'Create and optimize dashboards customized for actionable business insights, enhancing user experience and data security management.', 'Provide ad-hoc reports and analytics to department leaders, collaborating closely with stakeholders. Initiate projects to enhance business operations, actively engaging with the business management team to propose value-driven solutions and business cases.', 'Supervise local IT partners to ensure compliance with IT General Security Controls and organizational standards, conducting periodic reviews.'], 'Qualifications:': ["Bachelor's or advanced degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Digital Technology, or related disciplines.", 'Minimum of 10 years of substantial experience in SAP S4 HANA SD/MM/WM/FI/CO module integration with non-SAP applications.', 'Experience as a Business IT Solutions Manager in an advisory or tech consultancy environment is a bonus. Proven track record in identifying and addressing business requirements, supported by a strong network of operational business relationships.', 'Demonstrated expertise in project management, adept at employing methodologies to yield tangible business results.', 'Proficiency in FMCG and manufacturing sectors. Experience with System Integration-SI partners is a distinct advantage.', 'Hands-on experience in SAP SDLC delivery methods, ensuring faithful implementation according to design specifications.', 'Dynamic and proactive, with a keen attention to detail and a focus on delivering high-quality results.', 'Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, complemented by adept presentation capabilities.', 'A native speaker of Thai who is proficient in English']}
qualification: {"Responsibilities:Lead the development and implementation of end-to-end technological solutions across various business functions.Demonstrate proven expertise with SAP S/4HANA applications and other non-SAP applications, overseeing integration spanning functional modules connected to Big Data/Omni Commerce platforms and Retail system platforms.Direct the development, implementation, and support of complex business processes in an SAP environment, emphasizing optimal and best practice technical solutions.Enforce rigorous SAP Security IT General Controls and processes in accordance with organizational guidelines, conducting regular reviews to prevent violations.Analyze key business metrics to identify opportunities for continuous improvement and risks, managing full SDLC cycles to strengthen both SAP and non-SAP solutions.Create and optimize dashboards customized for actionable business insights, enhancing user experience and data security management.Provide ad-hoc reports and analytics to department leaders, collaborating closely with stakeholders. Initiate projects to enhance business operations, actively engaging with the business management team to propose value-driven solutions and business cases.Supervise local IT partners to ensure compliance with IT General Security Controls and organizational standards, conducting periodic reviews.Qualifications:Bachelor's or advanced degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Digital Technology, or related disciplines.Minimum of 10 years of substantial experience in SAP S4 HANA SD/MM/WM/FI/CO module integration with non-SAP applications.Experience as a Business IT Solutions Manager in an advisory or tech consultancy environment is a bonus. Your understanding is greatly appreciated.Argyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.": 'Lead the development and implementation of end-to-end technological solutions across various business functions.Demonstrate proven expertise with SAP S/4HANA applications and other non-SAP applications, overseeing integration spanning functional modules connected to Big Data/Omni Commerce platforms and Retail system platforms.Direct the development, implementation, and support of complex business processes in an SAP environment, emphasizing optimal and best practice technical solutions.Enforce rigorous SAP Security IT General Controls and processes in accordance with organizational guidelines, conducting regular reviews to prevent violations.Analyze key business metrics to identify opportunities for continuous improvement and risks, managing full SDLC cycles to strengthen both SAP and non-SAP solutions.Create and optimize dashboards customized for actionable business insights, enhancing user experience and data security management.Provide ad-hoc reports and analytics to department leaders, collaborating closely with stakeholders. IT Services & IT Consultant  Over 1,000 employees
AXONS, we are a global leader in Agricultural Technology innovator (Agri-Tech). We are committed to drive agriculture industrial to become digital technology agriculture through data innovation-driven for
 providing the best information to support every business decision making. 
We aim to create a Digital Platform in the food production and distribution process to elevate working standards of farmers, customers, and business partners to grow together sustainably. We create new standards for better living for every life. All of production

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), IT Project Management / Team Lead, Programming / Software Development
company_overview:
Charoen Pokphand Group Co., Ltd, a leading company in Thailand, serves as a parent company of C.P. Group. As a holding company, Charoen Pokphand Group Co., Ltd. holds
 shares of subsidiaries in Thailand and overseas. The Group operates across many industries ranging from industrial to service.

With decades of industry leadership across multiple regions, we are recognized as a global leader and innovator in the food business. Our priority is to ensure the highest level of quality
 and safety in every product.

The key to our success lies in our ability to control end-to-end process that meets international standards. We start by using safe, trusted, and traceable materials to manufacture high-quality
 feed products for our animals. Then we combine advanced technology and research to raise a variety of animals such as chicken, duck, swine, shrimp, and fish in hygienic conditions. This produces the highest quality of meat selection to be processed into tasty,
 ready-to-eat meals for consumers worldwide.

We have also expanded our businesses to several areas which include retail, telecommunication and media, e-commerce and digital, property development, plastics, automotive, finance and insurance,
 and pharmaceutical.

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Security
company_overview:
BUZZEBEES was established in 2012 as a tech startup and rapidly grown to become
Thailand #1 CRM & Digital Engagement Platform.





We started our business a decade ago from building customized Loyalty and Rewards Redemption Platform, Sourcing deals and privileges for our Enterprise clients. Now, we expand our business to cover end-to-end Digital Engagement and CRM needs, offering services
 both for Enterprise and Retail clients with a goal to become the largest ecosystem by building a digital road to connect business of all sizes in the digital world.
Our mission has always been CONNECTING THE WORLD. We do that by providing CRM, Loyalty, and Digital Engagement Solutions for business to do Digital Transformation and accelerate their growth in the digital era.





Our 4 Main Services





1. CRM Loyalty & Marketing Platform
2. Rewards & Privileges Management
3. E-Commerce Enabler Service
4. Retail & Restaurant Solutions
With more than hundreds of millions of users currently using our platforms together with a team of expertise with decades of experiences has allowed us to understand consumers behaviors thus allowing BUZZEBEES to present solutions that meet all business
 needs and become competitive Leaders in the industry our clients are pursuing.

company_overview:
Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Jaiyos is the Thailand practice of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu, an organization of member firms devoted to excellence in providing professional
 services and advice. We are focused on client service through a global strategy executed locally in nearly 150 countries. With access to the deep intellectual capital of 120,000 people worldwide, our member firms (including their affiliates) deliver services
 in four professional area: audit, tax, consulting, and financial advisory services. Our member firms serve over one-half of the world's largest companies, as well as large national enterprises, public institutions, and successful, fast-growing global growth
 companies. Our mission is to help our clients and our people excel.
Commitment and talent is what we look for. We seek people who can work effectively in a dynamic team environment and demonstrate leadership potential. We are looking
 for people who are willing to take ownership and responsibility for tasks, and ready to respond to request from clients and senior personnel in a timely manner. Proficiency in written and spoken English is an advantage.

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Programming / Software Development
company_overview:
Betagro Group,Founded in 1967,
 Betagro Group established its business empire with the production and distribution of animal feed.

   The Group has grown substantially ever since:
First, by establishing a livestock production
 facility in Pak Chong, Nakhon Ratchasima Province, and then expanding further into the integrated agricultural sector with a complete production base in Lop Buri Province, which includes everything from manufacture and livestock farming to animal breeding,
 from producing pigs, broilers, layer chickens and breeders to manufacturing and distributing animal health products. The Group has also developed strategic collaborations with local farmers. Examples include price guarantee for broilers and layer chickens,
 contract farming for fattening swine, production and distribution of hygienic and fresh pork, chicken and eggs as well as manufacture of processed foods for domestic consumption and export to international markets.
Today, apart from being positioned as a country leader in the fully integrated agro-industrial and food business
 sector, Betagro Group is widely recognised for its quality and safety standards. It has earned numerous accolades in product quality excellence and production standard certifications, locally and internationally, covering several areas from animal feed, livestock
 development, animal health products to premium quality food products for export and domestic consumption. All of these are designed to meet different needs of consumers under the concept of “Quality for Life”.
The Two Core Businesses & One Support Unit are :

1. Agro Businesses; Feed Business, Animal Health Business, Pet Business & Others

2. Food Businesses; Factory (Food & Meat Processing), Livestock (Swine, Poultry & Aqua), Regional Business,
 Sales & Marketing, Foreign Integration Business 
3. Holding; Support & Technical Function, Restaurant & Deli, Hotel & Resort, Others
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Performance bonus, Five-day work week

company_overview:
SVI is a leading EMS service provider and a highly esteemed Public Limited Company founded in 1985. Our company has since been providing total Electronics and Manufacturing solutions in Thailand with additional regional and global operations across South
 East Asia, Europe and USA. Presently, SVI is recognized as a market leader in these global markets. Our operations cover specialized EMS manufacturing and solution oriented services; including but not limited to, Industrial Electronics, Micro-Electronics for
 telecommunications components, specialized electronic assemblies and medical technologies industries. Within these specialist EMS areas, SVI’s highly experienced EMS teams leave no stone unturned in our client’s EMS analysis so we can meet their every need.
 As a result, our EMS experts are able to continuously deliver the most competitive operational costs offering true value to all our client’ operations. In order to adequately serve these EMS markets cost effectively and logistically, SVI’s primary operations
 are strategically located just 45 minutes from Bangkok’s main international airport and only 90 minutes from Thailand’s busiest and most advanced seaport. At the heart of SVI’s solution based services and operational excellence is a professional company culture
 working to build amicable business relationships and partnerships. This commitment and dedication to service excellence, competitive costing strategies and high quality complex EMS solutions is why SVI has been able to attract large prestigious businesses
 successfully assisting these client in operating competitive and cost effective EMS systems. Owing to SVI’s global success is the company’s founding mission; to supply a full range of quality turnkey projects within professional and industrial electronic industry
 sectors as well as a dedication to placing high value on client relationships in order to understand their needs in each individual case.

company_overview:
PRIMO : Omnichannel Marketing Platform
PRIMO is a Thailand-based startup founded by 2MIT Sloan graduates who have diverse background in retail technology and consumer banking.
PRIMO focuses on enabling enterprise marketers to perform at their best by utilizing consumer data and membership that they already have.
PRIMO's platform offers technologies and services that facilitate flow of membership privileges focusing on mobile-related touch-points. PRIMO helps membership programs with
 easy and cost-effective means in acquiring, managing, and delivering personalized privileges to their members. Concurrently, PRIMO enable brands and merchants to optimize below the line marketing campaigns by giving discounts and special offers to targeted
 members of existing membership programs.
PRIMO is funded by Fuchsia VC , Beacon VC and SOSV, one of the world top five leaders in early stage startups investment.

field.3+ years of experience in cloud infrastructure and operations, with a minimum of 2 years in a leadership role.Deep expertise in Azure, AWS, and GCP. Experience with local cloud infrastructure is a plus.Strong understanding of cloud architecture and best practices.Knowledge of Windows / Linux based systemsknowledge of LAN/WAN solutions, include experience with Cisco routers and switches, Internet firewalls, VPNFamiliarity with monitoring and ITSM tools like CloudWatch, Azure Monitor, OpManager, ServiceDesk plus.Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work under pressure.Excellent communication and collaboration skills.'}

URGENTLY REQUIRED !!!
Mizuho Bank, Ltd. Bangkok Branch,
Japan's oldest bank that one of the predecessors established the first National Bank over 150 years, believe that our greatest strengths lie
 in the strong customer base in Japan and overseas, our extensive network, and a sense of trust and confidence. In Japan, we are one of the largest customer base.

 In global presence, we are leading global bank located among 120 offices over nearly 40 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe, Middle East,
 and Africa, and the Americas.

 into a next-generation financier. To this end, it is essential to create change by bringing together diverse human resources and communicating closely by making full use of the "free and open corporate culture" that accepts a wide variety of staff. This is
 one of the characteristics of "Mizuho”.

“Passion for Better”
SCG is a leading conglomerate company operating for over a century with an embedded sustainable development approach under good corporate governance principles. SCG pledges further
 efforts to create excellent innovations, services and integrated solutions in 3 core business units, namely Cement-Building Materials Business, Chemicals Business, and Packaging Business.
The key of SCG is our people. We aim to empower our employees by providing skill and capability enhancement at all levels to meet ever-changing consumer demands. We believe that
 over 50,000 SCG employees in our businesses across ASEAN region will collectively seek solutions and create innovations for better living of consumers. And we are ready to move
 forward together to pursue the development of community and society for sustainable growth.

BEC World Public Co., Ltd.


BEC World Group is an entertainment conglomerate in Thailand that operates 2 type of business;
Broadcasting and Media Business and
Program Sourcing – Production Distribution and Support Business.

We are the parent company of Bangkok Entertainment Co. Ltd., operator of TV Color Channel 3, BEC Multimedia Co. Ltd., operator of TV3 HD
Vision
Thailand’s leading content and entertainment platform
วิสัยทัศน์
ผู้นำทางด้านคอนเทนต์และธุรกิจบันเทิงของประเทศไทย
Mission (2023)

Rebuild BECW to become a forward-thinking and lean organization, leveraging CH3 creative DNA to deliver fresh and engaging content for today’s users, and technology to deliver innovative
 and effective media, across all screens, beyond Thailand 
พันธกิจ (2023)

ปรับเปลี่ยน BEC World ให้เป็นองค์กรที่มีความคล่องตัวและมีความคิดไปข้างหน้า โดยยกระดับดีเอ็นเอความคิดสร้างสรรค์ของช่อง 3 เพื่อส่งมอบความสดใหม่ ด้วยคอนเทนต์ที่เชื่อมโยงกับผู้ชมในปัจจุบันและใช้เทคโนโลยีกับการ
 นำเสนอนวัตกรรมใหม่ๆ เพื่อเป็นสื่อที่มีประสิทธิภาพ ผ่านทุกช่องทางหน้าจอ ทั่วไทยและต่างประเทศ

company_overview:
กลุ่มธุรกิจการเงินเกียรตินาคินภัทร หรือ KKP เกิดขึ้นจากการผสานความเชี่ยวชาญด้านธุรกิจธนาคารพาณิชย์และธุรกิจตลาดทุนเข้าด้วยกัน ซึ่งประกอบด้วยธนาคารเกียรตินาคินภัทร จำกัด (มหาชน) บริษัทหลักทรัพย์เกียรตินาคินภัทร
 จำกัด (มหาชน) บริษัทหลักทรัพย์จัดการกองทุน เกียรตินาคินภัทร จำกัด และบริษัทหลักทรัพย์ เคเคพี ไดม์ จำกัด  
โดยมุ่งสร้างความเป็นเลิศในการให้บริการทางการเงิน และก่อประโยชน์สูงสุดต่อลูกค้า พนักงาน ผู้ถือหุ้น ตลอดจนมีส่วนร่วมพัฒนาตลาดการเงินและเศรษฐกิจของประเทศ ผ่านผลิตภัณฑ์และบริการ ครอบคลุมทั้งด้านตลาดเงินและตลาดทุน  
ที่ KKP เราเชื่อในเรื่องการสร้างโอกาสสู่ความสำเร็จ มีโอกาสมากมายในองค์กรเรา มีพื้นที่ให้คุณได้เรียนรู้และเติบโต ได้ทำและสร้างผลงานอย่างเต็มศักยภาพ ได้ผลตอบแทนที่คุ้มค่า ได้สนุกอย่างเต็มที่
 และได้ภูมิใจที่ได้สร้างประโยชน์ต่อผู้อื่นและสังคม 
หากคุณกำลังมองหาที่ทำงานที่เปิดโอกาสให้คุณได้เติบโต และสร้างอนาคตเพื่อชีวิตที่ดี เพื่อสังคมที่ดี และเพื่ออนาคตที่ดี มาร่วมเป็นส่วนหนึ่งกับเรา... เพราะ KKP ที่นี่มีโอกาส 
The establishment of Kiatnakin Phatra Financial Group (KKP) brought together knowledge and experience of commercial banking and capital markets businesses. The group comprises of Kiatnakin
 Phatra Bank PLC, Kiatnakin Phatra Securities PLC, Kiatnakin Phatra Asset Management Co., Ltd., and KKP Dime Securities Co., Ltd.
Our goal is to provide top-notch financial services while ensuring maximum benefits for customers, employees, and shareholders, and to contribute to the growth of the nation's financial
 markets and economy through our products and services, which encompass both money markets and capital markets.
KKP is committed to fostering opportunities for success. Here, you will have the chance to learn, develop, and realize your full potential. We believe in providing fulfilling rewards, promoting
 a fun work environment, and being proud to make a positive impact on society.
If you are looking for a work environment that offers you opportunities to grow for a better life, a better workplace, and a better future.  Come and join us!
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Five-day work week

qualification: {"Please\xa0only apply through this link\xa0https://1j7nh74ssrh.typeform.com/to/Cn1zmijIApplications on this site will not be monitoredLocation: Bangkok, Thailand (Remote work possibility)Language Requirement: Fluent in EnglishCompany OverviewWe are growthautomation.ai, a custom AI software development agency. Come January we are building out a team in Bangkok to help with the agency work and to build a Sass product.Job DescriptionWe are seeking a highly skilled and motivated AI/LLM/Python developers to join our dynamic team in Bangkok, Thailand. This role involves working on cutting-edge SaaS solutions that leverage the power of artificial intelligence and large language models. You will be working alongside our CTO and 2-3 other team members.Who we are looking for:We are on the lookout for exceptionally motivated individuals who are not just looking for a job, but a career-defining opportunity. Ideal candidates are those passionate about propelling their career forward rapidly in a dynamic startup environment.
