position: IT Enterprise Solution Architect/IT Enterprise Solution Architect
company: Muang Thai Insurance Public Company Limited
job_highlight: IT Enterprise Architect/TOGAF, Zachman/problem-solving
qualification: {"Key Responsibilities:Solution Design: Collaborate with business stakeholders, senior management, and IT teams to understand business requirements, challenges, and opportunities. Develop and maintain an overarching architectural vision for the organization's IT landscape.System Integration: Evaluate existing systems, applications, and platforms within the non-life insurance domain. Identify opportunities for integration, consolidation, or replacement to streamline operations and reduce redundancy.Architecture Development: Create and maintain comprehensive architecture blueprints, standards, and guidelines. Ensure that the architecture aligns with industry best practices and supports the company's digital transformation initiatives.Technology Evaluation: Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends. Evaluate new technologies and assess their suitability for adoption within the organization's IT ecosystem.Requirements Analysis: Work closely with business analysts to gather and refine business requirements. Translate these requirements into technical specifications and architectural designs.Solution Validation: Collaborate with development teams to ensure that solutions are developed in accordance with the architectural design and standards. Conduct architecture reviews and provide guidance throughout the development lifecycle.Risk Management: Identify potential risks and challenges associated with architectural decisions. Develop mitigation strategies and contingency plans to address these risks.Vendor Management: Interact with external vendors and third-party solution providers to evaluate, select, and integrate external software, services, and platforms into the IT landscape.Performance Optimization: Monitor system performance, scalability, and security. Recommend and implement optimizations to enhance system reliability, responsiveness, and efficiency.Documentation and Communication: Document architectural decisions, guidelines, and best practices. Communicate architectural concepts and solutions effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.Compliance and Security: Ensure that IT solutions comply with regulatory requirements and industry standards, especially regarding data security and privacy in the insurance sector.Team Collaboration: Collaborate with other IT teams, such as infrastructure, security, and data management, to ensure that architectural decisions align with cross-functional IT strategies.Qualifications:Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.Proven experience as an IT Enterprise Solution Architect, preferably within the non-life insurance industry.Strong knowledge of architecture frameworks and methodologies (e.g., TOGAF, Zachman).Familiarity with insurance industry standards and regulations.Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.Ability to work collaboratively in a team and influence stakeholders at all levels.Proficiency in modeling tools and software architecture design principles.": "Solution Design: Collaborate with business stakeholders, senior management, and IT teams to understand business requirements, challenges, and opportunities. Develop and maintain an overarching architectural vision for the organization's IT landscape.System Integration: Evaluate existing systems, applications, and platforms within the non-life insurance domain. Identify opportunities for integration, consolidation, or replacement to streamline operations and reduce redundancy.Architecture Development: Create and maintain comprehensive architecture blueprints, standards, and guidelines. Ensure that the architecture aligns with industry best practices and supports the company's digital transformation initiatives.Technology Evaluation: Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends. Evaluate new technologies and assess their suitability for adoption within the organization's IT ecosystem.Requirements Analysis: Work closely with business analysts to gather and refine business requirements. Translate these requirements into technical specifications and architectural designs.Solution Validation: Collaborate with development teams to ensure that solutions are developed in accordance with the architectural design and standards. Conduct architecture reviews and provide guidance throughout the development lifecycle.Risk Management: Identify potential risks and challenges associated with architectural decisions. Develop mitigation strategies and contingency plans to address these risks.Vendor Management: Interact with external vendors and third-party solution providers to evaluate, select, and integrate external software, services, and platforms into the IT landscape.Performance Optimization: Monitor system performance, scalability, and security. Recommend and implement optimizations to enhance system reliability, responsiveness, and efficiency.Documentation and Communication: Document architectural decisions, guidelines, and best practices. Communicate architectural concepts and solutions effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.Compliance and Security: Ensure that IT solutions comply with regulatory requirements and industry standards, especially regarding data security and privacy in the insurance sector.Team Collaboration: Collaborate with other IT teams, such as infrastructure, security, and data management, to ensure that architectural decisions align with cross-functional IT strategies."}
job_functions: Information Technology (IT), DBA, Others
company_overview:
URGENTLY REQUIRED !!!
บริษัท เมืองไทยประกันภัย จำกัด (มหาชน) เพื่อก้าวต่อไปสู่... บริษัทประกันวินาศภัยระดับแนวหน้าของประเทศไทย ภายใต้ชื่อ “บริษัท เมืองไทยประกันภัย จำกัด (มหาชน)” การเปิดบันทึกหน้าใหม่ในครั้งนี้
 เกิดจาก “การควบกิจการระหว่าง บริษัท ภัทรประกันภัย จำกัด (มหาชน) และ บริษัท เมืองไทยประกันภัยจำกัด” เป็นการผนึกกำลังครั้งประวัติศาสตร์ของธุรกิจประกันวินาศภัย เพื่อเพิ่มความแข็งแกร่งและศักยภาพในการแข่งขันของธุรกิจ และการให้บริการโดยรวมความเชี่ยวชาญของทั้ง
 2 บริษัทให้ส่งเสริมจุดเด่นซึ่งกันและกันอย่างลงตัว รวมไปถึงการแสดงความพร้อมเพื่อสนองตอบนโยบายการเปิดเสรีธุรกิจประกันภัยในอนาคตอันใกล้

ด้วยเป้าหมายและความมุ่งมั่นเพื่อประกาศชื่อสู่ความเป็นบริษัทประกันวินาศภัยชั้นนำอันดับต้นของประเทศ
เป็นบริษัทที่มี ความั่นคงจดทะเบียนในตลาดหลักทรัพย์ ด้วยทุน
จดทะเบียน 590 ล้านบาทรวมไปถึงเป็นบริษัท
ประกันวินาศภัยของคนไทยที่มีการบริหารงานด้วยหลักจริยธรรมและความโปร่งใส ยึดหลักธรรมาภิบาล

บริษัท เมืองไทยประกันภัย จำกัด (มหาชน) เสริมสร้างความเชื่อมั่นแก่สาธารณชน ด้วยพัฒนาการที่ดีมาโดยตลอด มีเอกลักษณ์ในความเป็นบริษัทประกันวินาศภัยของคนไทยที่เน้นการบริหารงานด้วยความโปร่งใส ยึดหลักธรรมาภิบาล
 ให้ความใส่ใจสังคม ซึ่งผู้บริหารและพนักงานทุกคนตระหนักถึงความสำคัญและร่วมใจกันรักษาไว้อย่างต่อเนื่อง จากการดำเนินงานที่มีประสิทธิภาพประกอบกับการให้บริการที่ซื่อสัตย์สุจริตแก่ลูกค้าจนได้รับความไว้วางใจ ทำให้ชื่อเสียงของบริษัทฯ เป็นที่รู้จักและยอมรับของสาธารณชนทั่วไป
บริษัทฯมุ่งมั่นจะพัฒนาการบริการให้มีประสิทธิภาพสูง สามารถตอบสนองความต้องการของลูกค้าทุกกลุ่มรวมไปถึงการสนับสนุนกิจกรรมเพื่อสังคมที่บริษัทฯ ได้มุ่งมั่นดำเนินการมาอย่างต่อเนื่อง ทุกกิจกรรมที่บริษัทฯ ได้สร้างสรรค์มุ่งหวังให้เกิดรอยยิ้มขึ้นในใจของทุกคน
 ไม่ว่าจะเป็นพนักงาน ลูกค้า คู่ค้า และประชาชนทั่วไป และจากความมุ่งมั่นตั้งใจอย่างเต็มเปี่ยมนี้ ส่งผลให้บริษัทฯ ก้าวขึ้นสู่ตำแหน่งผู้นำอันดับต้นๆ ในวงการประกันภัย รับประกันได้จากรางวัลบริษัทประกันวินาศภัยบริหารงานดีเด่นอันดับ 2 ประจำปี 2554 (2 ปีซ้อน: 2554-2555)ซึ่งถือเป็นรางวัลอันทรงเกียรติแห่งปีที่บริษัทฯ
 ได้รับจากสำนักงานคณะกรรมการกำกับและส่งเสริมการประกอบธุรกิจประกันภัย (คปภ.)
บริษัท เมืองไทยประกันภัย จำกัด (มหาชน) ยังคงมุ่งมั่นบริหารงานเพื่อสร้างความสำเร็จไปพร้อมกับรอยยิ้มของทุกคน ดังสโลแกน...
“เมืองไทยประกันภัย ยิ้มได้เมื่อภัยมา”
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Five-day work week

company_overview:
Cathcart Technology is an agile and independent technology recruitment consultancy headquartered in the UK. Since our establishment in 2009, the UK company was awarded with many recognitions
 and nominations. In 2015, we recognized a great opportunity for us to expand into the emerging technology market in Thailand. Ever since then, we are proud to say that we are playing a part in making Bangkok become one of the most important technology markets
 worldwide.
.
At Cathcart Technology, we specialize in sourcing and placing tech talents in a wide range of industries in Thailand, across a variety of business sectors from startups to enterprise organizations.
 As a boutique agency, we take immense pride in delivering highly professional and tailored services to both our valued clients and exceptional candidates.


Why choose us?

Expert Recruiters: 
Our team of experienced recruiters have a deep understanding of the Thai tech market and maintains a large database of highly qualified IT candidates.
Specialization:  With our specialization, strong work ethic, and years of experience, we are the best choice for matching the right talents with your organization and
 finding the ideal roles for our candidates. Extensive Resources:  We have invested heavily in our database and advertising reach to ensure that we have access to the best IT talents in Thailand to provide our
 clients with a competitive advantage to get ahead in the market. Streamlined Services:  We provide straightforward yet professional and effective services, throughout the recruitment process from start to finish.

Working and partnering with Cathcart Technology for seamless tech recruitment and thrive in the dynamic world of technology.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ 
Visit our website: https://cathcarttechnology.co.th
LinkedIn : 
Cathcart Technology Thailand
Facebook : Cathcart Technology

job_highlight: Cyber Risk, IT Risk Management, Cybersecurity/IT Compliance, IT Governance, IT Audit/Proficiency in Thai & English Communication
qualification: {'Job DescriptionWe help our clients better comprehend and manage technology, cyber and information risks. By closely understanding our clients’ issues and strategies, we assist them by managing their technology risks and to align with their business objectives.We help clients:— identify, manage and reduce their technology and cyber security risks— meet their IT compliance and governance obligations— increase confidence that their IT, risk management, and security practices satisfy their needsResponsibilitiesLead and manage teams in delivering technology and cyber risk services to clients in the financial services sector. These services range from designing and developing frameworks, strategies and operating models for cyber security and IT risk management, to performing compliance assessments and assurance engagements. Example activities include:1. Performing maturity assessments and roadmap development in the security, IT risk, and data governance domains.2. Designing, developing, and implementing frameworks, policies, procedures, and standards.3. Performing gap assessments against regulatory requirements and providing recommendation to remediate the gaps.4. Performing IT, cyber risk & third-party risk assessments.5. Performing IT auditsSupport the project lead in the project scoping and planning, financial management, delivery risk management, production, and review of deliverables.Take ownership for the completion of assigned work within the agreed timeframe and quality standards.Coordinate with client and keep track of project status.Build and manage excellent client relationships.Actively identify and progress business development opportunities, as well as manage sales activities such as proposal writing and assisting with client presentations.Coach and develop team members on engagementsQualification6+ years’ experience in Technology and Cyber Risk with expertise in at least one of the following domains: IT risk management, information security, data privacy, IT compliance, IT governance, BCM, or IT auditAbility to develop excellent client and internal relationshipsAbility to deliver work within tight timescales and to a high qualityAbility to present on specific subjects to a large group of peopleProfessional Certifications: CISSP, ITIL strongly preferred.Strong understanding of relevant frameworks and standards, such as COBIT, NIST, ITIL, ISO 27K, PCI DSS, ISO22301Knowledge of relevant laws and regulations will be considered an advantage.Bachelor’s or Master’s degree from an accredited college/university in Information Systems and Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Management Information System, Technology Management, or a related disciplineProficiency in spoken and written Thai and good English': 'Lead and manage teams in delivering technology and cyber risk services to clients in the financial services sector. These services range from designing and developing frameworks, strategies and operating models for cyber security and IT risk management, to performing compliance assessments and assurance engagements. Example activities include:', 'Job Description': 'Support the project lead in the project scoping and planning, financial management, delivery risk management, production, and review of deliverables.Take ownership for the completion of assigned work within the agreed timeframe and quality standards.Coordinate with client and keep track of project status.Build and manage excellent client relationships.Actively identify and progress business development opportunities, as well as manage sales activities such as proposal writing and assisting with client presentations.Coach and develop team members on engagements', 'We help our clients better comprehend and manage technology, cyber and information risks. By closely understanding our clients’ issues and strategies, we assist them by managing their technology risks and to align with their business objectives.': '6+ years’ experience in Technology and Cyber Risk with expertise in at least one of the following domains: IT risk management, information security, data privacy, IT compliance, IT governance, BCM, or IT auditAbility to develop excellent client and internal relationshipsAbility to deliver work within tight timescales and to a high qualityAbility to present on specific subjects to a large group of peopleProfessional Certifications: CISSP, ITIL strongly preferred.Strong understanding of relevant frameworks and standards, such as COBIT, NIST, ITIL, ISO 27K, PCI DSS, ISO22301Knowledge of relevant laws and regulations will be considered an advantage.Bachelor’s or Master’s degree from an accredited college/university in Information Systems and Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Management Information System, Technology Management, or a related disciplineProficiency in spoken and written Thai and good English'}
job_functions: Information Technology (IT), IT Auditing, Security, IT Consulting
company_overview:
KPMG is a global network of professional firms providing Audit, Tax, and Advisory services. We operate in 156 countries and have more than 155,000 professionals
 in all member firms around the world.
Joining KPMG Thailand is an opportunity to become a member of a leading international firm where your personal and professional development is taken seriously.
We have a wide range of clients and projects and so your work will always be varied and interesting. The changes in business environment provide new challenges
 and at KPMG, we work together as a team to offer the appropriate approaches to these challenges for our clients.
We are now looking for high performing people in all levels from various backgrounds as we offer exceptional career opportunities across Audit, Tax, Advisory,
 and support functions.
company_benefits_incentives: Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Five-day work week

We have a wide range of clients and projects and so your work will always be varied and interesting. The changes in business environment provide new challenges
 and at KPMG, we work together as a team to offer the appropriate approaches to these challenges for our clients.
We are now looking for high performing people in all levels from various backgrounds as we offer exceptional career opportunities across Audit, Tax, Advisory,
 and support functions.

company_overview:
Krungsri is a strategic member of MUFG Bank, Ltd. (MUFG Bank), a wholly-owned subsidiary of Mitsubishi
 UFJ Financial Group (MUFG) – Japan’s largest financial group and one of the world’s financial groups with the most varied financial services and products. As of the end of 2018, the Bank’s registered capital totaled 75,741 million baht, while our paid-up capital

We are passionate about meeting and acquiring talents. No matter who you are, gender, race, age, religion;

job_highlight: IoT Technology , Smart Home/Software/IT Manager
qualification: {'"As an IoT Product Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing the development and management of IoT (Internet of Things) products within our company. You will play a crucial role in defining the product strategy, gathering customer requirements, and driving the product development process from ideation to launch. You will collaborate with external vendors (manufactures/Software outsource teams) and internal cross-functional teams, including engineering, design, marketing, and sales, to ensure successful product execution and market adoption."Responsibilities\xa0Develop IoT Product Strategy:Conduct market research to identify customer needs, trends, and competitive landscape.Define the product vision, roadmap, and feature prioritization based on market insights.Collaborate with stakeholders to align the product strategy with business objectives.Gather and Define Requirements:Engage with customers, partners, and internal stakeholders to understand their IoT needs and pain points.Translate customer requirements into clear product specifications and user stories.Working with various device manufactures/software vendors and/or OEMs for HW and SW integration.Product /Software Development and Management:Lead the end-to-end product development process, from concept to release.Create and maintain product roadmaps, release plans, and project schedules.Collaborate with various manufacture teams/software vendors to ensure timely\xa0 delivery of high-quality products.Conduct user acceptance testing (UAT) and gather feedback to iterate on product /software features.Go-to-Market Strategy:Collaborate with marketing and sales teams to develop effective product positioning,\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 messaging, and pricing strategies.Support the creation of marketing collateral, including product documentation, sales presentations, and demos.Assist with product launch activities, such as coordinating with cross-functional teams and organizing promotional events.Product Performance Analysis:Define key performance indicators (KPIs) and track product/software performance against targets.Analyze user feedback, market trends, and usage data to identify areas for product improvement.Make data-driven recommendations for feature enhancements, updates, or product iterations.Qualifications:Bachelor\'s degree in programing, computer science, engineering, or a related field Proven experience (3 years) as a Product Manager, preferably in the IoT domain.Strong tools.Familiarity with programming languages such as Python, Java, or C++.Experience with database systems, APIs, and web services.Familiarity with Agile development methodologies.Excellent project company_overview:
ผลิตภัณฑ์ ของ Pzent ได้ถูกออกแบบ พัฒนา และ ผลิต โดยบริษัท พรีเซ้นต์ เทคโนโลยี จำกัด บริษัท พรีเซ้นต์ เทคโนโลยี จำกัด คือผู้นำในการออกแบบพัฒนา
ผลิตและจำหน่ายอุปกรณ์บรรยายไร้สาย อุปกรณ์และระบบในการช่วยนำเสนองาน (presentation) ให้กับองค์กรชั้นนำ ทั้งภาครัฐ และ เอกชน
เป็นศูนย์รวมนวัตกรรมเทคโนโลยีเกี่ยวกับบ้าน และที่พักอาศัย รวมถึงอาคารสำนักงานต่างๆ เพื่อความสะดวกสบาย ความปลอดภัยของผู้บริโภค เป็นมิตรกับสิ่งแวดล้อม ประหยัดพลังงาน ด้วยการศึกษาค้นคว้าจากทีมงานผู้เชี่ยวชาญด้านนวัตกรรมและเทคโนโลยี
 จนได้รับความไว้วางใจจากบริษัททั่วไป โดยใช้เครื่องมือที่เหมาะสม ไม่ว่าจะเป็น Application ผ่าน Smartphone และระบบบริหารจัดการข้อมูลบน Cloud เราเติบโต และพัฒนาอย่างต่อเนื่อง ด้วยการนำนวัตกรรมเทคโนโลยีใหม่ๆ เข้ามาตอบสนองลูกค้า ทั้งทางภาครัฐ และเอกชน ด้วยศักยภาพของทีมงานที่มีความเชี่ยวชาญเฉพาะด้าน
 จึงทำให้ลูกค้าไว้วางใจตลอดมา

ผลิตภัณฑ์ ของ Pzent ได้ถูกค้นคว้า พัฒนา และตรวจสอบโดยทีมงานผู้เชี่ยวชาญด้านวิศวกรก่อนจะนำเข้าสู่ลายการผลิต พร้อมทั้งเรามีทีมงานที่มีความเชี่ยวชาญ
ด้าน Qualtiy Control (QC) จะทำการทดสอบสินค้าให้เรียบร้อย และได้มาตราฐานก่อนนำส่งลูกค้า
company_benefits_incentives: Gratuity, Performance bonus, Transportation allowance, Travel allowance, Work from home, Flexible working hours

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Application Specialist - Network, Network & System, IT Consulting
company_overview:
ATA IT Ltd. (National Bank of Canada Group) established
 in Thailand on February 2016 will be acting as an “IT hub” or “IT center” for commercial banks and other companies in South East Asia and Pacific Ocean areas.

National Bank of Canada (BNC) is
 the major shareholder and parent company of ATA IT LIMITED. BNC is an integrated provider of financial services to retail, commercial, corporate and institutional clients.

National Bank is the leading bank in Quebec and the partner of choice for small and medium-sized enterprises. It is also the sixth
 largest bank in Canada with branches in almost every province. Clients in the United States, Europe and other parts of the world are served through a network of representative offices, subsidiaries and partnerships.

Its head office is located in Montreal and its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange.

With $232 billion in assets as at October 31, 2016, National Bank of Canada, together with its subsidiaries, forms one of Canada's
 leading integrated financial groups. The Bank has more than 21,000 employees and is widely recognized as a top employer. Its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX: NA). Follow the Bank's activities at nbc.ca or via social media such as Facebook,
 LinkedIn and Twitter.

ATA IT Limited offers the structure for professional growth, with the necessary support for full development of abilities, while valuing
 team work, leadership and commitment.

If you are looking for a challenging opportunity to develop yourself, to learn, and to achieve professional success, join us!
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Transportation allowance, Work from home, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Application Specialist - Network, Network & System
company_overview:
ATA IT Ltd. (National Bank of Canada Group) established
 in Thailand on February 2016 will be acting as an “IT hub” or “IT center” for commercial banks and other companies in South East Asia and Pacific Ocean areas.

National Bank of Canada (BNC) is
 the major shareholder and parent company of ATA IT LIMITED. BNC is an integrated provider of financial services to retail, commercial, corporate and institutional clients.

National Bank is the leading bank in Quebec and the partner of choice for small and medium-sized enterprises. It is also the sixth
 largest bank in Canada with branches in almost every province. Clients in the United States, Europe and other parts of the world are served through a network of representative offices, subsidiaries and partnerships.

Its head office is located in Montreal and its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange.

With $232 billion in assets as at October 31, 2016, National Bank of Canada, together with its subsidiaries, forms one of Canada's
 leading integrated financial groups. The Bank has more than 21,000 employees and is widely recognized as a top employer. Its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX: NA). Follow the Bank's activities at nbc.ca or via social media such as Facebook,
 LinkedIn and Twitter.

ATA IT Limited offers the structure for professional growth, with the necessary support for full development of abilities, while valuing
 team work, leadership and commitment.

If you are looking for a challenging opportunity to develop yourself, to learn, and to achieve professional success, join us!
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Overtime pay, Performance bonus, Work from home, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

qualification: {"Mandatory requirement: Please apply in English or your application will not be considered.Step into a captivating role as a Backend Developer at Wunderman Thompson MAP. Fuel your software development passion by transforming critical business requirements into exceptional cloud-based solutions. Rapid learning and adaptability will drive you, ensuring alignment with business and team objectives.What will your day look like?As a Backend Developer with us, you will be at the heart of crafting exceptional software solutions. Your expertise in C#/.Net development will shine as you build powerful cloud-based Rest APIs and Cloud Services. Collaborating within a dynamic, multicultural environment, you will seamlessly convert business requirements into innovative outcomes. Your technical prowess, alongside your ability to embrace change, will ensure your contributions support both your team and broader business goals.Who will you collaborate with?Joining our dynamic Catalyst Brief team, you will seamlessly integrate into our diverse community of professionals spanning Copenhagen and Madrid. Your collaboration will extend to our global tech, data, and design experts, fostering a creative, collaborative, and thriving environment.What do you bring to the table?As an individual, your passion for contributing to impactful projects is matched by your proactive and independent approach to problem-solving. You thrive in collaborative environments, where your responsible and autonomous mindset helps you identify issues and propose effective solutions. Building strong relationships with your team and stakeholders comes naturally to you, as you understand the value of effective communication and teamwork.Qualifications:A University degree in Computer Science (or equivalent Software-related), or a strong Professional Portfolio3+ years of C#/.NET development experienceSolid grasp of SOLID Principles and OOP Design PatternsExtensive proficiency in developing REST / ASP.NET Web APIs within a (Micro) Service-Oriented ArchitectureExpertise with EntityFramework in both DB first and Code-First scenariosProven track record in Agile-based projectsStrong verbal and written English communication (approximately B2 level)Ability to excel in a distributed, multi-cultural team-based environmentIdeally You Also Bring:Experience with MS SQL Server Databases / T-SQLFamiliarity with Microsoft Azure serverless application development servicesInsight into DevOps practicesExperience with Marketing Automation SystemsKnowledge of Umbraco CMS, or other CMS systemsA leader in personalized customer experiences:Wunderman Thompson MAP stands as a world-leading Centre of Excellence, facilitating the humanization of the brand-customer relationship for large businesses through hyper Personalisation at scale, Marketing Automation, and CRM. With the brain of a consultancy, the heart of an agency, and the power of technology and data, we collaborate with some of the world's most admired brands, guiding their transformation journey towards becoming truly customer-centric.Please note that this job is a full-time position located in Bangkok, Thailand, but the selection process will be conducted in English.": 'A University degree in Computer Science (or equivalent Software-related), or a strong Professional Portfolio3+ years of C#/.NET development experienceSolid grasp of SOLID Principles and OOP Design PatternsExtensive proficiency in developing REST / ASP.NET Web APIs within a (Micro) Service-Oriented ArchitectureExpertise with EntityFramework in both DB first and Code-First scenariosProven track record in Agile-based projectsStrong verbal and written English communication (approximately B2 level)Ability to excel in a distributed, multi-cultural team-based environment'}

company_overview:
PERSOLKELLY is one of the largest recruitment companies in Asia Pacific that provides comprehensive end-to-end HR solutions. It combines resources and operational expertise of its key brands
 i.e., Kelly Services, Capita, PERSOL in Asia Pacific, First Alliances, BTI Executive Search, and PERSOLKELLY Consulting.
Headquartered in Singapore, PERSOLKELLY spans over 50 offices across 13 countries including: Australia, China, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Korea, Malaysia, New Zealand, Philippines, Singapore,
 Taiwan and Thailand. 
PERSOLKELLY is a joint venture between PERSOL Holdings, Japan's second largest recruitment firm and Kelly Services Inc., a global leader in workforce solutions.
 
For more information, please visit
www.persolkelly.com

company_overview:
Who is HUGEMAN?
In the ever-changing digital world, HUGEMAN is a team of innovators, strategists, designers, and engineers ready to take on the most complex challenges with a wide range of innovation
 consulting services.

We are passionate about what we do and want our partners to succeed, to become the HUGEMAN.

Our Way of Life!
The environment at HUGEMAN is like no other. Our workplace is a pleasant and inspiring place where you may learn, connect, rest, and build your own growth and professional path.

As a member of the HUGEMAN team, you can expect to experience rapid personal growth as you tackle increasingly difficult tasks. There is nothing to be afraid of in the face of new problems because you are not on your own.

If you enjoy a good challenge, are willing to learn something new, have a positive outlook, and are determined to make a difference in the world, then let's get started together!
Where are we going to meet?

We are working remote from home and have an office around BTS Saphan Khwai area.
Our team come to office 3 days per week (Monday, Wednesday, and Friday)(https://goo.gl/maps/RaQHbo5JokJywpk28)
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Gratuity, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Work from home, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

job_highlight: Business Continuity Framework/Crisis Management/IT risk management frameworkISO27001,Cybersecurity
job_desc: {'Job Purpose:': ['Conducts risk assessments for various departments and functions, analyzing potential business impact due to loss of digital systems.', 'Identify, analyze, and evaluate digital systems and data related risks, including potential threats, vulnerabilities, and impacts on business continuity.', 'Develop and implement risk mitigation strategies and controls to minimize the likelihood and impact of disruptions.', 'Conduct regular risk assessments and gap analyses to identify emerging risks and recommend appropriate risk treatment measures.', 'Monitor and report on risk indicators and metrics to ensure proactive risk management.'], 'Job Responsibility:': ['Align recovery time and point objectives with requirements from the business and technical/financial viability for critical systems.', 'Ensure system specific recovery playbooks for critical digital systems are designed, documented and maintained by the relevant technical teams, and capable to support the agreed recovery time, and point objectives.', 'Develop comprehensive continuity plans with the business that defines how they will continue to operate while system recovery is ongoing; reviews, revises, and expands existing plans and protocols.', 'Ensure business continuity plans are developed, owned and maintained by business stakeholders.', 'Conduct regular tests, drills, and exercises to validate the effectiveness of system recovery plans and identify areas for improvement.'], '(a.) Risk Management:': ['Stay up to date with relevant industry standards, best practices, and regulatory requirements related to IT risk management and business continuity.', 'Ensure compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and contractual obligations.', 'Develop and maintain policies and procedures to address compliance requirements.', 'Conduct periodic audits and assessments to evaluate compliance.'], '(b.) Business Continuity Planning:': ['Collaborate with internal stakeholders, including IT teams, executive management, and business units, to understand their requirements and align risk management and business continuity initiatives with organizational goals.', 'Provide guidance and support to business units during the development and implementation of business continuity plans.', "Act as a subject matter expert on IT risk management and business continuity, providing training and awareness programs to enhance the organization's overall resilience."], '(c.) Compliance and Regulatory Requirements:': ['University degree/College diploma in the field of computer science and/or information security', '10+ years’ experience, preferably with a background in IT Operations and Risk governance process', 'Proven experience developing and implementing IT business continuity plans and strategies.', 'Excellent strategic, problem solving, and analytical skills.', 'Background in hypothetical situations and concepts and to identify risks and weaknesses in various business processes.', 'Ability to collaborate with others to develop an emergency plan.', 'Strong knowledge of IT risk management frameworks, such as ISO 27001, NIST Cybersecurity Framework, or COBIT', 'Familiarity with relevant regulatory requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA, SOX) and industry standards (e.g., PCI DSS)', 'Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to assess and prioritize risks effectively.', 'Strong communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate with stakeholders at all levels.', 'Experience in incident response and crisis management is preferred.', 'Professional certifications such as Certified Business Continuity Professional (CBCP) or Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) are a plus.', 'Creation, management or administration of policies and processes with superior written and verbal communication skills', 'Be willing to work flexible hours including evenings and weekends as the job demands and travel as required.', 'Be more than approachable with your superior interpersonal skills.']}
qualification: {"Job Purpose:To protect and enhance the organization's digital systems and processes by developing and implementing strategies, policies, and procedures that mitigate risks and ensure business continuity during disruptive events. Collaborate with cross-functional teams across Thai Union Group (TUG) to identify, assess, and prioritize IT-related risks, while ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations. By developing comprehensive digital system recovery plans, coordinating recovery efforts, and fostering stakeholder engagement this role will play a pivotal role in safeguarding the organization's systems and data and minimizing interruptions to operations.Job Responsibility:(a.) Risk Management:Conducts risk assessments for various departments and functions, analyzing potential business impact due to loss of digital systems.Identify, analyze, and evaluate digital systems and data related risks, including potential threats, vulnerabilities, and impacts on business continuity.Develop and implement risk mitigation strategies and controls to minimize the likelihood and impact of disruptions.Conduct regular risk assessments and gap analyses to identify emerging risks and recommend appropriate risk treatment measures.Monitor and report on risk indicators and metrics to ensure proactive risk management.(b.) Business Continuity Planning:Align recovery time and point objectives with requirements from the business and technical/financial viability for critical systems.Ensure system specific recovery playbooks for critical digital systems are designed, documented and maintained by the relevant technical teams, and capable to support the agreed recovery time, and point objectives.Develop comprehensive continuity plans with the business that defines how they will continue to operate while system recovery is ongoing; reviews, revises, and expands existing plans and protocols.Ensure business continuity plans are developed, owned and maintained by business stakeholders.Conduct regular tests, drills, and exercises to validate the effectiveness of system recovery plans and identify areas for improvement.(c.) Stakeholder Engagement:Collaborate with internal stakeholders, including IT teams, executive management, and business units, to understand their requirements and align risk management and business continuity initiatives with organizational goals.Provide guidance and support to business units during the development and implementation of business continuity plans.Act as a subject matter expert on IT risk management and business continuity, providing training and awareness programs to enhance the organization's overall resilience.(e.) Develops (with support from vendor) and provides staff training on risk management/business continuity and disaster recovery.(f.) Support the Group IT Director, Head of Information Security and IT in the definition of the strategic orientations of digital risk management at Thai Union(g.) job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Security
company_overview:
About Thai Union Group PCL (TU):
Thai Union Group PCL is the world’s seafood leader bringing high quality, healthy, tasty and innovative seafood products to customers across the world for almost 40 years.
Today, Thai Union is regarded as the world’s largest producer of shelf-stable tuna products with annual sales exceeding THB 125 billion and a global workforce of over 46,000 people who
 are dedicated to pioneering sustainable, innovative seafood products.
The company’s global brand portfolio includes Thai-leading brands Sealect, Fisho and Bellotta and market-leading international brands such as Chicken of the Sea, John West, Petit Navire,
 Parmentier, Mareblu, King Oscar, and Rügen Fisch
As a company committed to innovation and globally responsible behaviour, Thai Union is proud to be a member of the United Nations Global Compact, and a founding member of the International
 Seafood Sustainability Foundation (ISSF). The company’s work on sustainability has been recognized by its inclusion in Dow Jones Sustainability Indices (DJSI) for 9 straight years. DJSI is a family of indices evaluating the sustainability performance of thousands
 of publicly traded companies. The company was ranked number one on the Food Products Industry Index, a position it previously held in 2018 and 2019.
company_benefits_incentives: Life insurance, Medical insurance, Five-day work week

company_overview:
KASIKORN Business - Technology Group (KBTG)
KBank, as the digital banking leader, is readying for future changes and challenges by establishing KBTG, with the aim of boosting IT management and service efficiency, enhancing competitiveness
 amid global FinTech transitions, while maintaining business leadership
Vision:
We are toward The High Performing IT Organization and Workforce that is agile to adapt to the dynamic industry and delivering innovative products and services
Mission:
We aim to build Technology and Innovation capability to provide frictionless end-to-end services and comprehensive digital banking solutions that would create a disruptive
 force within the industry.

Build professional workforce that have both Business and Technology capability
Work in partnership with FinTech firms and tech-startups to explore financial innovations, aimed at enhancing competitiveness amid changes in global financial technology
Cultivate Organization Culture which focused on Value Creation, Innovation and Agility
Improve the Bank’s processes efficiency and effectiveness with automated services and also develop new information technologies in the hope of offering more comprehensive financial services
 to customers

qualification: {"Responsibilities:\xa0As a Cloud Security Consultant, you will be at the front lines with our clients supporting them with their Cloud security needs specifically helping them navigate the journey to the cloud on leading platform such as AWS, GCP and Azure.Depending on your experience and interests, we have a wide range of areas and challenges for you covering all aspects of standards, and procedures e.g., tenant, management group and subscription management and configuration, identify management and access control, firewall management, auditing and monitoring, security cloud architecture frameworks / security reference architectures for public and hybrid cloud models, including IaaS, PaaS or other cloud services.Secure Design and implementation of different CSP job_functions: Professional Services, Business Consultancy, Information Technology (IT), Security, Network & System
company_overview:
Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Jaiyos is the Thailand practice of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu, an organization of member firms devoted to excellence in providing
 professional services and advice. We are focused on client service through a global strategy executed locally in nearly 150 countries. With access to the deep intellectual capital of 120,000 people worldwide, our member firms (including their affiliates) deliver
 services in four professional area: audit, tax, consulting, and financial advisory services. Our member firms serve over one-half of the world's largest companies, as well as large national enterprises, public institutions, and successful, fast-growing global
 growth companies. Our mission is to help our clients and our people excel. 

Commitment and talent is what we look for. We seek people who can work effectively in a dynamic team environment and demonstrate leadership potential.
 We are looking for people who are willing to take ownership and responsibility for tasks, and ready to respond to request from clients and senior personnel in a timely manner. Proficiency in written and spoken English is an advantage.

company_overview:
“Bangchak Corporation Public Company Limited is a Thai energy company that operates in tandem with socio-environmental responsibility. Its core business is petroleum refining to
 produce high-standard products from domestic and international sources. With a capacity of 120,000 barrels per day (120 KBD), Bangchak produces and distributes its products through more than 1,000 service stations nationwide. It has expanded its businesses
 to oil trading, green power, bio-based products, and natural resources and business development. Its ultimate goal is to enhance national energy security and expand new investments so that its businesses may be sustained.
Today our vision is to be a leading Greenovation group with five core businesses, one Bangchak Initiative and Innovation Center, and businesses in other countries.”
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Five-day work week

company_overview:
Krungsri is a strategic member of MUFG Bank, Ltd. (MUFG Bank), a wholly-owned subsidiary of Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG) – Japan’s
 largest financial group and one of the world’s financial groups with the most varied financial services and products. As of the end of 2018, the Bank’s registered capital totaled 75,741 million baht, while our paid-up capital reached 73,558 million baht. Krungsri
 is Thailand’s fifth largest commercial bank in terms of assets, loans, and deposits.
We are passionate about meeting and acquiring talents. No matter who you are, gender, race, age, religion; We embrace all differences
 and diversity. Door of opportunities at Krungsri family are open for everyone who are looking to challenge themselves regardless of individual differences by using their best endeavors to achieve excellence and mutual success with us. That is our Krungsri
 DNA.
At Krungsri, employees are also considered as key stakeholders and valuable resources of the Bank. They play vital roles in driving the
 organization towards business targets and the organization is unlikely to achieve stability if its employees lack development. The Bank’s employees are also essential indicators of its directions and successes in the future.
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Free shuttle bus, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Work from home, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

company_overview:
Cathcart Technology is an agile and independent technology recruitment consultancy headquartered in the UK. Since our establishment in 2009, the UK company was awarded with many recognitions
 and nominations. In 2015, we recognized a great opportunity for us to expand into the emerging technology market in Thailand. Ever since then, we are proud to say that we are playing a part in making Bangkok become one of the most important technology markets
 worldwide.
.
At Cathcart Technology, we specialize in sourcing and placing tech talents in a wide range of industries in Thailand, across a variety of business sectors from startups to enterprise organizations.
 As a boutique agency, we take immense pride in delivering highly professional and tailored services to both our valued clients and exceptional candidates.


Why choose us?

Expert Recruiters: 
Our team of experienced recruiters have a deep understanding of the Thai tech market and maintains a large database of highly qualified IT candidates.
Specialization:  With our specialization, strong work ethic, and years of experience, we are the best choice for matching the right talents with your organization and
 finding the ideal roles for our candidates. Extensive Resources:  We have invested heavily in our database and advertising reach to ensure that we have access to the best IT talents in Thailand to provide our
 clients with a competitive advantage to get ahead in the market. Streamlined Services:  We provide straightforward yet professional and effective services, throughout the recruitment process from start to finish.

Working and partnering with Cathcart Technology for seamless tech recruitment and thrive in the dynamic world of technology.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ 
Visit our website: https://cathcarttechnology.co.th

Cathcart Technology Thailand
Facebook : Cathcart Technology

qualification: {"Jobs Description:\xa0Develop and implement the Electronic Toll Collection System (ETC) project in Thailand. In charge of the back-end system implementation of the motorway toll collection system, e.g., M-Flow, toll parking service, etc. You need to cooperate with the expert team of FETC from Taiwan, good command of English communication is required.You may need to know multi-threaded background programming and know how to efficiently access large amounts of data on the databases. Yet able to understand the deep learning implementation along with practically integrating it into the system. company_overview:
Aiming to be the pioneering Tolling and Intelligent Transportation System (ITS) Service Provider in Thailand, FETC International Thailand Co., Ltd. (FETCi TH) has acquired subsequent
 knowledge from the its parent company Far Eastern Electronic Toll Collection Co., Ltd. (FETC) and FETC International Co., Ltd. (FETCi), which have implemented and operated successful national tolling BOT project in Taiwan and be recognized multiple international
 organizations such as IBTTA, ITS World Congress and IRF.
FETCi TH would like to take advantage of the above Taiwanese experiences of turning the traditional highway tolling system into convergent highway for mobility management, and utilizing
 City Congestion Pricing as the strategic instruments, to develop the products, solutions, and services which are specifically designed for Thai environment and national development, based on the principle of technology transfer, trying its best to enhance
 the current Thai local road business into a more sophisticated and pioneering development for digital economy of Thai 4.0.

* IBTTA Toll Excellence Awards, 2015
* ITS World Congress Hall of Fame - Industry Award, 2015
* eASIA Awards, 2015
* Finalist for R&D 100 Award in the Software/Services Category, 2015
* IRF Global Road Achievement Awards, 2016
* WITSA Global ICT Excellence Awards in the Private Sector Excellence Category, 2017

qualification: {"The Mobile Developer in the Innovation Hub & Digital Solution Department of THAI LIFE INSURANCE PLC. is responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining mobile applications that provide new features and enhancements using React Native and SpringBoot technologies. job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Programming / Software Development, Others
company_overview:
eCloudvalley is a born-in-the-cloud Premier Tier Services Partner of Amazon Web Services(AWS). This is the highest tier for partners and our expertise focuses entirely
 on AWS services, such as next generation managed services, cloud migration, and data & analytics. We are one of the largest AWS partners worldwide. We have over 2000+ enterprise customers and obtained over 680 AWS professional certifications, a huge testament
 to the reliability and practicality of our solutions.
eCloudvalley is a fast-growing company, starting AWS business at the beginning of 2014 and obtained the status of AWS Managed Service Provider Partner in 2016.
In 2017, eCloudvalley became the very first AWS Premier Consulting Partner in the Greater China Region (GCR) and acquired certifications of ISO 27001 and ISO 27017. In the same year, we
 obtained the status of AWS Authorized Training Partner and started to provide a well-organized AWS learning path for our customers. Then, we also passed AWS DevOps Competency, AWS Security Competency, AWS SAP Competency, AWS Data & Analytics Competency, and
 AWS Mobile Competency, etc. With all these competencies audited by AWS, eCloudvalley cloud solutions are proved to be effective and reliable. Moreover, eCloudvalley is one of the notable vendors in the Asia Pacific Representative Vendors of Public Cloud MSP
 recognized by Gartner in 2022 and 2020.
eCloudvalley has committed to digitalize with cloud since our first day of business. We have committed to evolve our technology skills and continue to provide intelligent,
 automated managed services for our customers.
Core Expertise of eCloudvalley Technology 

Cloud Migration (Server/VM/SAP/DB)
Next Generation Managed Services
Big Data and Analytics
Development on AWS
DevOps and Microservices
Cybersecurity

Why eCloudvalley?
At eCloudvalley Technology, it's not just about work; it's about being part of a thriving community dedicated to revolutionizing cloud technology. Joining our team means becoming a valued
 member of a global family, united by a shared passion for innovation and excellence. Here at eCloudvalley, talents will have the chance to cultivate their career, contribute to cutting-edge solutions, and leave a lasting mark on the world of cloud technology.
Our Hiring Culture
At eCloudvalley Technology, we hold Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) as integral pillars of our identity. We recognize the transformative power that comes with embracing diversity,
 and we leverage on our position as a leading global cloud innovator to drive positive social change.
As an employer, we are resolutely dedicated to fostering an inclusive environment, guided by the belief that it is both morally right and pivotal for our success. This commitment translates
 into tangible benefits - it enhances our business performance and cultivates a company culture where every team member feels not only welcome and safe, but also valued and respected. This way, our employees can wholeheartedly focus on their work, free from
 the shackles of prejudice or discrimination.
We labor diligently to establish a robust DEI foundation that permeates every level of our company. In doing so, we pave the way for the next generation of leaders, ensuring that opportunities
 for growth and advancement are accessible across every dimension of diversity.
We firmly assert that everyone has a place in the world of cloud technology. Recognizing that diversity is not just a cornerstone of our culture but also a driving force behind our business
 achievements, we are broadening our aspirations to mirror the communities we serve. Our goal is to make eCloudvalley Technology a space where all individuals can not only flourish but also thrive, contributing to a more equal, equitable future.
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Overtime pay, Five-day work week

job_highlight: ERP System/Experience in Oracle database, MS SQL, MySQL/BTS Saphan Taksin
qualification: {'An ERP Developer is responsible for developing and maintaining the software that makes up an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system. They create and modify the system’s modules, ensure the software is meeting the company’s requirements and implementing changes to improve the system’s performance. They also provide technical support, accounting reports and ensure data security.A successful candidate expects to work proactively and closely with accounting team and internal development teams to understand the organization’s systems, new application or feature released in order to reach the business target objective.Responsibilities:Maintain, modify and improve existing ERP systemsTranslate business requirements into technical system solutions.Create and maintain user interfaces, databases, programs form and reports.Providing technical support and problem resolution to the business users on Oracles E-Business Suite.Control and monitor Oracles E-Business Suite (ERP system)Support new requirement of Oracle E-Business Suite (ERP system).Maintain security protocols.Qualifications:\xa0Bachelor degree or higher in Computer Engineering Computer Science Information Technology or related fields.Minimum 1+ years’ experience in functional supporting on Oracle E-Business SuiteExperience in functional supporting Oracle E-Business Suite specially Finance (GL, AP, AR, FA, CM) and Purchasing modules (PO, iPro)In-depth knowledge of Oracle E-Business SuiteExperience in Oracle Developer (Report, Form), TOAD, PL/SQL Developer.Experience in Oracle database, MS SQL, MySQL will be an advantageAnalytical mind and problem-solving aptitudeAble to handle things under pressure management situations.': 'Maintain, modify and improve existing ERP systemsTranslate business requirements into technical system solutions.Create and maintain user interfaces, databases, programs form and reports.Providing technical support and problem resolution to the business users on Oracles E-Business Suite.Control and monitor Oracles E-Business Suite (ERP system)Support new requirement of Oracle E-Business Suite (ERP system).Maintain security protocols.', 'An ERP Developer is responsible for developing and maintaining the software that makes up an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system. They create and modify the system’s modules, ensure the software is meeting the company’s requirements and implementing changes to improve the system’s performance. They also provide technical support, accounting reports and ensure data security.A successful candidate expects to work proactively and closely with accounting team and internal development teams to understand the organization’s systems, new application or feature released in order to reach the business target objective.Responsibilities:': 'Bachelor degree or higher in Computer Engineering Computer Science Information Technology or related fields.Minimum 1+ years’ experience in functional supporting on Oracle E-Business SuiteExperience in functional supporting Oracle E-Business Suite specially Finance (GL, AP, AR, FA, CM) and Purchasing modules (PO, iPro)In-depth knowledge of Oracle E-Business SuiteExperience in Oracle Developer (Report, Form), TOAD, PL/SQL Developer.Experience in Oracle database, MS SQL, MySQL will be an advantageAnalytical mind and problem-solving aptitudeAble to handle things under pressure management situations.'}
job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Application Specialist - Software, Programming / Software Development, IT Consulting
company_overview:
Kerry Express is the best parcel delivery platform in Thailand in terms of geographic coverage and level of services; our next-day delivery service covers
 99% of all postal codes; and 98% of the parcels are delivered within the estimated delivery time; we serve thousands of businesses, individuals and households in sending their parcels to anywhere you can imagine in Thailand;
Our mother company has its head office in Hong Kong, Kerry Logistics Network Limited (listed company in Hong Kong Stock Exchange) is Asia’s leading logistics service provider
 with solid presence in countries and global network covering over locations across six continents.
Kerry Express (Thailand) Public Company Limited has 11 sister companies in Thailand including Shangrila
 Hotel Group, Bangkok Post, Kerry Siam Seaport, Kerry Logistics, Kerry Distribution, Kerry Asia Road Transport and etc.
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Five-day work week

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Programming / Software Development
company_overview:
ZILO is focused on transforming the global asset management sector to create sustainable value for firms and the customers they serve. To achieve this, we started with a clean technology
 slate, a design-driven approach, and a commitment to put people first. ZILO's technology enables firms to replace legacy technology and end-of-life systems, many of which were developed 30+ years ago, and slash costs, risk, and user friction along the way.
This digital transformation journey requires strong partnerships with our customers to modernise and expand their product and service propositions by unifying the full breadth of transfer agency
 into a single global solution.
While we are a young fintech, our founders, leadership, engineering, and product teams are highly experienced with successful track histories of pioneering innovation-driven businesses, products,
 and services in our sector. Our collective goal is to be the market leading solution in global asset management. We would also like to spread some joy along the way.

company_overview:
KDDI's Global Business
KDDI is one of the top ten telecom company in the world, we serve our customer with both global and local scope in operation from over 100 operation bases across the world. 
Our global business separate into 4 fields as below


System Integration Business
Network Business
Data Center Business
Mobile Phone Operator Business

KDDI Thailand's Business
KDDI Thailand is a subsidiary of KDDI Corporation, a one-stop provider that offers a multitude of communication services. KDDI Thailand provides comprehensive global and local ICT solutions as well as support for
 business development in Thailand using our close teamwork with our headquarters, our Singapore office (the regional headquarters) and other subsidiaries in the region.

KDDI Thailand offers variety of services, from international network services and LAN establishment to the supply of one PC unit, providing high quality support based on customer business requirements.

"KDDI Thailand is SI provider with skilled-engineer and many projects reference. We also provide service in response to Thailand-specific laws and business culture with many years of experience"

Our Service Lineup


Network (WAN, LAN, Wireless) Solution
Network Link (Internet / MPLS)
Network Security / Cyber Security
Server & Storage
Data Backup
Cloud Application (E-mail, Groupware, Cloud Server)
Office Security (CCTV, Finger scan)
Telephone (PABX, IP, Wireless)
TV Conference, Tele-Conference
PC / Laptop
Cabling Service
Maintenance Service / IT Support desk

Benefits:


Company mobile phone
Company car service (for onsite)
Over time allowance
Holidays and Leaves
Dental & Group Health Insurance
Provident Fund
Annual Medical Check-Up
Salary increment
Bonus up to company performance
Training/Certificate allowance
Training Assistance
Etc.

More information
Website: https://th.kddi.com/

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Programming / Software Development
company_overview:
The Swatch Group
is an international Group active in the manufacture and sale of finished watches, jewelry, watch movements and components. Swatch Group supplies nearly all components required for the watches sold by its 17 brands as Breguet, Harry Winston, Blancpain,
 Glashutte Original, Jaquet Droz, Leon Hatot, Omega, Longines, Rado, Union Glashutte, Tissot Balmin, Certna Mido Hamiltion, Swatch and Flik Flak.
Equality
Our company focuses on and promotes diversity and coexistence in a multicultural society in terms of organizational management, human resource service including
 jointly developing the sustainability of the organization. In the workplace, we thrive to create equal opportunities, equal pay, and acceptance of diversity among our collaborators. We provide a safe, secure and inclusive workplace where people with diverse
 background can thrive. We also support the development and progress in the career path based on individual skills and internal opportunities.
Environment & Sustainability
The Swatch Group realizes the importance of climate change caused by global warming and takes part in the private sector initiative to act towards
 sustainable business processes and environment protection.
Benefits & Others
Competitive remuneration, Food Allowance, Free shuttle bus, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Fix bonus, Flexible working hours depending on job responsibility

Career @ Nestle
WE OFFER YOU A CAREER, NOT JUST A JOB

Nestlé is the world's leading Nutrition, Health and Wellness Company. Our mission of
"Good food, Good life" is to provide consumers with the best tasting, most nutritious choices in a wide range of food and beverage categories and eating occasions, from morning
 to night. 
Nestlé is a people-inspired company; respect and trust are our greatest strengths. We place high value on the unique perspectives
 that people bring to our team which sharpens our performance and drives our business. We welcome all applicants without regard to race, religion or belief, national origin, disability, marital, sexual orientation or age.
At Nestlé, We believe that the many different backgrounds, ways of thinking and cultural experiences of our people at every level of
 our business, makes for a richer workplace and gives us the insight and innovation to grow and continually delight our equally diverse consumers.

company_overview:
At Siam Pharmaceutical, we take pride in making quality pharmaceutical products affordable. To achieve this,
Siam Bheasach Co. Ltd. a GMP (good manufacturing practice) certified facility was set up with the capability to produce all pharmaceutical dosage forms: injectable, topical, oral preparations. To ensure quality, efficacy and safety of our products,
 we also conduct bioequivalent studies and clinical studies of our products at various academic institutions.
Our manufacturing plants are ISO 9000 and aIso 14001 certified. In 2002, Siam Bheasach's laboratory was the first pharmaceutical laboratory in Thailand to be ISO/IEC
 17025 certified aligning the laboratory's capability to test various products with reliable results with international standard.

job_highlight: Proficient in supporting operating systems/4 Yrs Exp in System Engr., IT Engr., Etc./Good Command of English
qualification: {'PRTR IT Recruitment is supporting our Japanese client which is a well-known company of electrical manufacturer, you will have a chance to work in an international environment and collaborate work with the regional IT team in Singapore.\xa0Overall JobBeing hands-on and troubleshooting skills for Windows servers on the VMware platform (Linux system admin is optional).Having the ability to monitor and provision on vCenter, troubleshoot issues on ESXi hosts, configure vSAN/network switches and DR based on vMotion with storage, etc.Monitoring all server system trigger thresholds on a central tool such as Solar Winds, Manage Engine, or Dell Open Manager Ent.Job DescriptionImplementing and maintaining Windows server network environments (with Linux optional) using Active Directory and management tools.Setting up, configuring, and troubleshooting Windows Server platforms (2016/2019/2022), VMware, and Linux systems.Integrating and managing Azure cloud resources within the infrastructure.Performing log monitoring, performance management, and capacity planning for the network and server systems.Maintaining infrastructure facilities to ensure adequate resources in the server room and data center.Managing security policies to protect the information system from vulnerabilities and risks.Maintaining IT infrastructure, user, group accounts, and Group Policies within Active Directory.Creating and Deploying software updates using Manage Engine or PowerShell script.Providing excellent customer service. Transform client experience by providing immediate and precise support on all technical issues.Monitoring and addressing security alerts and incidents.Testing new technologies.Creating and maintaining documents.QualificationsBachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, related.4 years of work experience as a System Engineer, configuring, deploying, and maintaining IT Infrastructure (Windows, Linux RHLE, VMware, etc.).2-3 years of experience implementing and provisioning VMware cluster farms.Proficient in supporting operating systems, Windows Server 2012/2016/2019, Microsoft Azure, Nutanix, VMware, Manage Engine Application, and SolarWinds.Good English communication skills (collaborate work with Regional Singapore and HQ Japan).': 'Being hands-on and troubleshooting skills for Windows servers on the VMware platform (Linux system admin is optional).Having the ability to monitor and provision on vCenter, troubleshoot issues on ESXi hosts, configure vSAN/network switches and DR based on vMotion with storage, etc.Monitoring all server system trigger thresholds on a central tool such as Solar Winds, Manage Engine, or Dell Open Manager Ent.'}

company_overview:
The Adecco Group
- Headquarter in Zurich, Switzerland, The Adecco Group is the world’s leading HR solutions company. We believe in making the future work for everyone, and every day enable more than 3.5 million careers.  Through our 35,000 employees, we skill, develop,
 and hire talent in 60 countries, enabling organisations to embrace the future of work. As a Fortune Global 500 company, we lead by example, creating shared value that fuels economies and builds better societies.
Adecco Thailand – Adecco Group Thailand is the leader
 in Human Resources Solutions, offering Recruitment service, Employment Staffing Service, Service Outsourcing, Business Process Outsourcing and Human Capital Solutions. With over 33 years of experience in Thailand, we have developed the network and expertise
 to assist companies in building successful teams. We are now operated with 9 Business Units, connecting over 18,000 Associates each day through Adecco network of over 350 Employees. Our recruitment managers and consultants are in possession of expertise, knowledge
 of industry and employment trends, enabling us to fully understand HR requirements and offer the most practical solutions to our clients.

ttb spark | จุดไอเดีย...ให้ทุกสิ่งเป็นจริงได้

ttb spark คือ Digital Hub ของ ทีเอ็มบีธนชาต หรือ ทีทีบี (ttb) ที่มีความเชื่อและความมุ่งมั่นที่จะสร้าง การเปลี่ยนแปลงที่มีความหมาย ให้กับชีวิตของลูกค้า ผ่านดิจิทัลเทคโนโลยีและไอเดียที่สร้างสรรค์ โดยไม่ยึดติดกับกรอบความคิดเดิมๆ
 กล้าทำสิ่งใหม่ๆ ให้เกิดขึ้นจริง

ttb spark เน้นการทำงานแบบ Agile เพื่อพัฒนาโซลูชัน บริการ รวมไปถึงนวัตกรรมดิจิทัล ที่ตอบสนองกับการเปลี่ยนแปลงทางด้านเทคโนโลยี และความต้องการของลูกค้าที่รวดเร็ว เพื่อให้ลูกค้าของเรามีชีวิตทางการเงินที่ดีขึ้นอย่างแท้จริง

company_overview:
กสิกร
คาราบาว (เคบาว)
บริษัท กสิกร คาราบาว จำกัด (บริษัทฯ) เป็นบริษัทร่วมทุนระหว่าง ธนาคารกสิกรไทย และ กลุ่มธุรกิจคาราบาว (ประกอบด้วย บริษัท คาราบาว กรุ๊ป จำกัด (มหาชน) และบริษัท ซีเจ เอ็กซ์เพรส จำกัด และบริษัท
 ทีดี ตะวันแดง จำกัด) ก่อตั้งขึ้นอย่างเป็นทางการในปี พ.ศ. 2565 โดยมีวัตถุประสงค์เพื่อให้บริการด้านการเงินแก่ลูกค้าและพันธมิตรในกลุ่มธุรกิจคาราบาว ซึ่งหมายรวมถึงผู้บริโภครายย่อยในระดับชุมชน / ตำบลที่ปัจจุบันนี้ยังไม่สามารถเข้าถึงบริการทางการเงินได้อย่างเต็มรูปแบบ
 โดยบริการทางการเงินดังกล่าวจะประกอบไปด้วยสินเชื่อ และการชำระเงิน / โอนเงินในรูปแบบต่างๆ ที่จะให้บริการผ่านช่องทางของร้านโชห่วยและร้านสะดวกซื้อของกลุ่มธุรกิจคาราบาวเป็นหลัก ได้แก่ ร้านถูกดี มีมาตรฐาน และร้านซีเจ มอร์ และ/หรือ ร้านซีเจ ซูเปอร์มาร์เก็ต ในรูปแบบที่ผสมผสานระหว่าง
 Online และ Offline เพื่อให้ตอบโจทย์และสอดคล้องกับพฤติกรรมของผู้บริโภคในกลุ่มนี้
ประเภทธุรกิจ: ธุรกิจบริการทางการเงิน
พันธกิจ: เพื่อให้บริการทางการเงินรูปแบบใหม่ที่สามารถเข้าถึงประชาชนไทยทั่วไปในระดับชุมชน
รวมถึงพันธมิตรร้านค้าสะดวกซื้อและพันธมิตรช่องทางการจัดจำหน่ายอื่นๆ
ในกลุ่มคาราบาว ซึ่งจะช่วยให้เพื่อพัฒนาเศรษฐกิจระดับชุมชนทั่วประเทศ และช่วยให้ประชาชนในชุมชนเข้าถึงบริการการเงินและสินเชื่ออย่างครบวงจร
วิสัยทัศน์:
บริการทางการเงินโดยชุมชน เพื่อชุมชน
แบบจำลองทางธุรกิจ:
ศูนย์กลางของชุมชน (Point of Everything)
KASIKORN CARABAO (kbao)
KASIKORN CARABAO COMPANY LIMITED, Joint Venture Company between Kasikornbank PCL and Carabao Conglomerate (Carabao Group PCL, CJ Express Co.,Ltd and TD Tawandang Co.,Ltd , has established
 in August 2022 that will provide financial technology services as a one-stop services to retail consumers, grocery stores, and suppliers within Carabao Conglomerate’s ecosystem.
Our company leverages financial technology enabled business solution to make financial services more accessible to retail customers in community areas, including providing support to retail
 businesses and driving community economic development across Thailand.
We are looking for highly motivated candidates who can excel in a fast-paced, tech-driven, dynamic startup work environment. If you feel you would like to join the journey with one of Thailand’s
 leading startups, then please submit your cv at 
[email protected]
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Five-day work week

Ascend Group is more than just a family of tech companies: it’s being part of the change to create opportunities for millions

company_overview:
Company Profile:

Depth First Co., Ltd. was founded on February 2003, with the aid of 2nd series incubator project of Dr. Veerasak Sungthavorn in Software Park in order to be the professional company providing program and website development services with JAVA program (JAVA
 Expert) and also provides the best solutions to support the online businesses and other related businesses of domestic and oversea companies. 

First, the company started with the aim to provide consulting IT services and implementation especially in Document Management System (DMS) for government sectors and commercial enterprises. 

Then we started developing applications based on customer needs (Tailor-made software) and adjust some parts to suit the actual work (customization) until we can created our own product such as: 

Office Automation. 
Document
 Management.
Online
 Database Management 

In 2008, Depth First has been appraised and rated at CMMI for Development Maturity level 2 in
 order to Quality control in implementing software and improve continuously our services and products to meet our customer's satisfaction even more.

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Support, IT Consulting, Others
company_overview:
About PERSOLKELLY

PERSOLKELLY is a joint venture established in 2016 between PERSOL Holdings (previously Temp Holdings) and Kelly Services to cater to the rising workforce employment needs of the emerging
 Asia Pacific market. We are one of the largest workforce solutions providers in the region, spanning over 50 offices across 13 markets including Australia, China, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, New Zealand, Philippines, Singapore, South Korea, Taiwan,
 Thailand and Vietnam.
Our reach, scope, and scale of operations have set the industry standard for cross-border recruitment and holistic workforce solutions. Since inception, PERSOLKELLY has placed over 66,000
 positions across the region and works together with 98% of Fortune 100™ companies for their workforce solution needs.

qualification: {'รายละเอียดของงาน : System Analysis Specialist\xa0 ด่วน !!วิเคราะห์และรวบรวมความต้องการของลูกค้า เพื่อใช้ในการออกแบบระบบนำเสนอทางเลือกที่เหมาะสมกับระบบที่พัฒนาให้กับลูกค้า เป็นที่ปรึกษาของลูกค้า ในการออกแบบระบบ Softwareควบคุม ดูแลการทำงานของทีมพัฒนา ให้ผลิตผลงานที่ถูกต้อง ตรงตามการออกแบบ และตรงตามเวลาที่กำหนดทำงานใกล้ชิดกับ Business User เพื่อสร้างความเชื่อมั่นว่า Project ที่พัฒนาจะเป็นไปตาม Business Requirement ของลูกค้าประสานงานกับ Project Manager เพื่อให้เกิดการทำงานร่วมกันที่ราบรื่น บริการที่ดี และเป็นที่พึงพอใจแก่ลูกค้าจัดทำเอกสารที่เกี่ยวข้องกับการออกแบบระบบต่างๆ เช่น Requirement Spec, Data Dict, DFD, ERD, UML, Program List, Program Flow, Application Specดูแลการทดสอบระบบจากลูกค้าแบบ Quality Assuranceจัดเตรียม Test Case Scenerio เพื่อใช้ในการทดสอบระบบควบคุมดูแลการติดตั้งระบบ รวมถึงการทดสอบระบบให้ได้คุณภาพและตรงตามความต้องการของลูกค้า ก่อนส่งมอบงานให้แก่ลูกค้าจัดเตรียมการ Training และเอกสาร User manual, System manualเสนอแผนการพัฒนาระบบ (Project Plan) ที่เหมาะสม เพื่อใช้ปฏิบัติงานภายในทีมงานที่เกี่ยวข้องดูแล และอบรม ความรู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องให้กับทีมงานดูแล และจัดการ Resource ที่มี ให้ทำงานที่เหมาะสม และ ทำงานร่วมกันได้อย่างราบรื่น รวมทั้งลดความขัดแย้งที่เกิดขึ้นภายในทีมงานประสานงาน/ แสดงผลงาน/ รายงานสถานะความคืบหน้าของงาน ต่อหัวหน้าทีมที่รับผิดชอบคุณสมบัติผู้สมัครงาน company_overview:
We,
ProsperSof Consulting Co., Ltd., called as
ProsperSof, are a professional business-IT-consulting provider for many large-medium enterprise business systems such as: Telecommunication, Insurance, Airline, Banking, University, Hospital, ERP,
 CRM, IVR, Back Office, and Workflow.
Our Vision
To be energetic leader in business consulting services for worldwide enterprise-business through practical innovation, valued customer experience, scalable network
 and potentiality people.
Our Pride

Jun 2009, ProsperSof officially delivers Flyer Pass system, e-commerce system for booking a flight
 and customer self-service of Bangkok Airways by using Flyer Pass Card. Aug 2009,
ProsperSof joins with Contour Graphic, our valued partner, to implement Amway-Touch Screen, a supporting center system for Amway Business Owners.
Sep 2009,
ProsperSof joins with Contour Graphic, our valued partner, to develop Amway-Thai Society Foundation system, a foundation website for Amway Thailand.

qualification: {'An ESIS Systems Engineer has the vital role of preparing, configuring, deploying and also monitoring the integration applications that have been developed by the Enterprise Integration Team and API development teams.\xa0 System Engineers work closely with the stakeholders of various systems to ensure that the deployed integration applications are secure, resilient and monitored to ensure maximum uptime and reliability.Requirements :\xa0- Software configuration and deployment management.\xa0\xa0- Responsible for managing and preparing release packages\xa0- Release management and controls.\xa0- Promote and control data, networks resources sharing and administrate systems.\xa0- Analyze the impact of system changes, improve quality of systems.\xa0- Compose design documents, diagram, user manual.\xa0- Support users testing.\xa0- Provide help or support in the resolution of production issues\xa0\xa0Qualifications :\xa0- Bachelor’s degree or higher in Computer Engineering, Computer Sciences, IT, or related field.\xa0- At least 1 year experience in control/deploy application (Fresh graduate with proven technical knowledge are welcome)\xa0- Good knowledge in computer programming language with good experience of at least one scripting language, e.g. python, shell scripts, etc- Knowledge of Relational Databases (SQL / PSQL)- Strong problem-solving and logical reasoning skills\xa0- Good communication and interpersonal skill (English would be advantage).\xa0- Proactive, self-motivated, systematic thinking, fast learner and positive attitude in teamwork.\xa0- Experience in one or more of the following will be an advantage:\xa0Good understanding of Web Services (SOAP, REST) and message formats (JSON,XML,YAML)\xa0Knowledge of Unit ofCI/CD (Source control, build/test/deployment automation)\xa0Knowledge of IBM Integration Bus, WebSphere Application Server\xa0Knowledge of scripting Python, PowerShell\xa0Knowledge in Unix,
