job_desc: {'POSITION: IT GOVERNANCE/ IT COMPLIANCE / PDPA': ['Developing and enhancing policy, procedures and processes related to IT management and security', 'Providing IT & security awareness session to enhance understanding level of policies and requirements', 'Performing project tracking & report (tracking issues related to IT operation and security until closing or risk acceptable level)', 'Performing project management related to ISO27001 & PCI DSS compliance', 'Monitor and work with IT infrastructure and software development teams to close the deviations and non-compliance issues', 'Responsible for day-to-day governance issues related to all IT operation and software quality and cyber security concerns to ensure compliance of IT & security policy, standard, and procedure', 'Developing and maintain security management / compliance dashboard to ensure all non-compliance issues are followed and tracked', 'Carrying out any other special assignment and administrative works as required in order to support departmental activities / management’s assignment'], 'WHY WORK WITH US': ['Bachelors or Master Degree in Information Technology, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Security with minimum 3 - 5 years of work experience in a relevant discipline', 'Knowledge in Cyber Security / IT audit / IT Governance / Software Quality Assurance', 'Good analytical and problem solving skillsGood project management skill', 'Be able to work under pressure and time constraintExperienced in data analytical and used analytical program such as Power BI, Macro Excel, Python is advantage', 'Good communication in written and spoken both Thai and English languages']}
qualification: {'POSITION: IT GOVERNANCE/ IT COMPLIANCE / PDPAWHY WORK WITH USKBTG is a tech organization in Southeast Asia that focuses on digital business innovation. It branched off from KBank, one of Thailand\'s leading commercial banks, and aims to become the best tech organization in the region. KBTG is committed to revolutionizing financial experiences by developing and innovating financial technologies with a "Customer First" mindset and new generation thinking. Its vision is to become the future of digital banking, empowering customers with easy, quick, and secure access to all financial services in every ecosystem.WHAT YOU CAN EXPECT FROM USWe value our people and aim to attract, develop and retain exceptional talent. We work in a truly agile and collaborative environment where opinions are actively encouraged. …. we have no time for finger-pointing and politics; instead, we test & learn and celebrate successes as a team.We will provide a training and coaching program to all our team members tailored to your development needs and aspirations. This can cover a wide range of skills, like mastering new technologies, developing your skills in presenting to a non-technical audience, or supporting your growth in a leadership position.DIVERSITY, EQUITY & INCLUSION AT KBTGOur DE&I policy is the synergy of our employees’ diverse genders, generations, races, cultures,\xa0backgrounds, experiences, perspectives, and practices to create a work environment where differences are\xa0respected and valued to achieve the organization’s vision of becoming a leader in digital infrastructure that fully connects people, organizations, economies, and societies to create sustainable value for life.WHAT YOU WILL BE DOINGIn this role, you will oversee all information security policy and procedures to ensure that they follow the bank\'s standard. Your work will also include developing and maintaining security management and compliance dashboard to detect and track all non-compliance issues.Developing and enhancing policy, procedures and processes related to IT management and securityProviding IT & security awareness session to enhance understanding level of policies and requirementsPerforming project tracking & report (tracking issues related to IT operation and security until closing or risk acceptable level)Performing project management related to ISO27001 & PCI DSS complianceMonitor and work with IT infrastructure and software development teams to close the deviations and non-compliance issuesResponsible for day-to-day governance issues related to all IT operation and software quality and cyber security concerns to ensure compliance of IT & security policy, standard, and procedureDeveloping and maintain security management / compliance dashboard to ensure all non-compliance issues are followed and trackedCarrying out any other special assignment and administrative works as required in order to support departmental activities / management’s assignmentWHAT YOU NEED TO SUCCEEDBachelors or Master Degree in Information Technology, Computer Engineering, Computer Science, Information Security with minimum 3 - 5 years of work experience in a relevant disciplineKnowledge in Cyber Security / IT audit / IT Governance / Software Quality AssuranceGood analytical and problem solving skillsGood project management skillBe able to work under pressure and time constraintExperienced in data job_functions: Information Technology (IT), IT Auditing, Security, IT Consulting
company_overview:
KASIKORN Business - Technology Group (KBTG)
KBank, as the digital banking leader, is readying for future changes and challenges by establishing KBTG, with the aim of boosting IT management and service efficiency, enhancing competitiveness
 amid global FinTech transitions, while maintaining business leadership
Vision:
We are toward The High Performing IT Organization and Workforce that is agile to adapt to the dynamic industry and delivering innovative products and services
Mission:
We aim to build Technology and Innovation capability to provide frictionless end-to-end services and comprehensive digital banking solutions that would create a disruptive
 force within the industry.

Build professional workforce that have both Business and Technology capability
Work in partnership with FinTech firms and tech-startups to explore financial innovations, aimed at enhancing competitiveness amid changes in global financial technology
Cultivate Organization Culture which focused on Value Creation, Innovation and Agility
Improve the Bank’s processes efficiency and effectiveness with automated services and also develop new information technologies in the hope of offering more comprehensive financial services
 to customers
company_benefits_incentives: Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Work from home, Five-day work week

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), IT Auditing, IT Project Management / Team Lead
company_overview:
The Group: Dextra Group
Established in Thailand since 1983 by a group of French entrepreneurs and with operations in Hong Kong, China, India, UAE, USA, France and Brazil, Dextra Group
 is a world leading manufacturer and distributor of engineered construction products for the building, civil and power industries. In addition to its core business, Dextra Group is also involved in other activities such as forwarding services and distribution
 of industrial products and equipment in Thailand, and distribution of plumbing products in Hong Kong. Dextra Group has been directly involved in supplying over 6,000 major construction or industrial projects worldwide and currently employs over 800 people
 and generates a turnover in excess of USD 100 million.
company_benefits_incentives: Life insurance, Overtime pay, Performance bonus

position: Infra Manager/ผู้จัดการส่วนระบบโครงข่ายสารสนเทศ
job_highlight: ระบบโครงสร้างพื้นฐานสารสนเทศ/ระบบโครงข่ายสารสนเทศ/Infrastructure
job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Security, Network & System
company_overview:
โรงพยาบาลศิริราชปิยมหาราชการุณย์ เป็นโรงพยาบาลใหม่ในสังกัดคณะแพทยศาสตร์ ศิริราชพยาบาล ภายใต้โครงการสถาบันการแพทย์สยามินทราธิราช
 ก่อตั้งขึ้นโดยมีวัตถุประสงค์เพื่อเป็นศูนย์กลางทางการแพทย์ ในการให้บริการ ดูแลรักษา และให้คำปรึกษาผู้ป่วยอย่างครบวงจร ซึ่งจะเปิดให้บริการในปี 2554 ซึ่งมุ่งเน้นการรักษาที่เป็นมาตรฐานแบบคณะแพทยศาสตร์ศิริราชพยาบาล และการให้บริการสะดวกสบายเทียบได้กับโรงพยาบาลเอกชนชั้นนำ
 โดยมุ่งเน้นมาตรฐานระดับสากล และการให้บริการสะดวกสบายเทียบได้กับโรงพยาบาลเอกชนชั้นนำ โดยมุ่งเน้นมาตรฐานระดับสากล Joint Commission International Accreditation (JCIA) รายได้ส่วนหนึ่งจากการปฏิบัติงานจะนำไปสนับสนุนการรักษาพยาบาลผู้ป่วยทั่วไปของโรงพยาบาลศิริราชต่อไป
 หากท่านเป็นผู้หนึ่งที่ศรัทธาในการทำงานเพื่อผลประโยชน์ส่วนรวมเป็นหลัก มุ่งมั่นตั้งใจและพร้อมจะเรียนรู้สิ่งใหม่ๆ เราขอเชิญชวนท่านมาร่วมเป็นส่วนหนึ่งของ โรงพยาบาลศิริราช ปิยมหาราชการุณย์
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Free shuttle bus, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Five-day work week

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Support, Others
company_overview:
URGENTLY REQUIRED!!!
องค์กรอินเทคค์ ก่อตั้งในปี พ.ศ. 2543 ด้วยวิสัยทัศน์มุ่งมั่นสร้างสรรผลิตและส่งมอบผลิตภัณฑ์คุณภาพ พร้อมบริการวิชาการที่ดีเลิศแด่ลูกค้าและสังคมอย่างต่อเนื่ององค์กรอินเทคค์เป็นผู้ผลิตและจัดจำหน่ายอาหารสัตว์น้ำ สัตว์บก และสัตว์เลี้ยง จัดจำหน่ายอาหารเสริมสำหรับสัตว์ และดำเนินธุรกิจฟาร์มสุกรพันธ์ สุกรขุน ผลิตภัณฑ์แป้งสาลีได้รับความสำเร็จและเจริญเติบโตโดยตลอด พร้อมขยายเข้าสู่ธุรกิจด้านอาหารสำหรับผู้บริโภค (Foods) ทั้งผลิตภัณฑ์จากแป้งสาลี และโปรตีน (Meat Proteins)เพื่อตอบสนองความต้องการที่หลากหลายของผู้บริโภค และสังคมโดยรวม ในปัจจุบันองค์กรอินเทคค์ยังได้ขยายธุรกิจไปยังกลุ่มประเทศอาเซียน กล่าวคือ ประเทศกัมพูชา เมียนมาร์ (พม่า) ลาว เวียตนามและประเทศอินเดีย
องค์กรอินเทคค์ต้องการผู้ร่วมงานที่มีศักยภาพสูง ใฝ่การเรียนรู้พัฒนา รักความท้าท้าย และมีสมรรถนะสูงมาเข้าร่วมเป็นส่วนหนึ่งขององค์กรเพื่อสร้างความสำเร็จร่วมกัน
company_benefits_incentives: Performance bonus

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Application Specialist - Network, Network & System, IT Consulting
company_overview:
ATA IT Ltd. (National Bank of Canada Group) established
 in Thailand on February 2016 will be acting as an “IT hub” or “IT center” for commercial banks and other companies in South East Asia and Pacific Ocean areas.

National Bank of Canada (BNC) is
 the major shareholder and parent company of ATA IT LIMITED. BNC is an integrated provider of financial services to retail, commercial, corporate and institutional clients.

National Bank is the leading bank in Quebec and the partner of choice for small and medium-sized enterprises. It is also the sixth
 largest bank in Canada with branches in almost every province. Clients in the United States, Europe and other parts of the world are served through a network of representative offices, subsidiaries and partnerships.

Its head office is located in Montreal and its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange.

With $232 billion in assets as at October 31, 2016, National Bank of Canada, together with its subsidiaries, forms one of Canada's
 leading integrated financial groups. The Bank has more than 21,000 employees and is widely recognized as a top employer. Its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX: NA). Follow the Bank's activities at nbc.ca or via social media such as Facebook,
 LinkedIn and Twitter.

ATA IT Limited offers the structure for professional growth, with the necessary support for full development of abilities, while valuing
 team work, leadership and commitment.

If you are looking for a challenging opportunity to develop yourself, to learn, and to achieve professional success, join us!
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Work from home, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

company_overview:
ttb spark | จุดไอเดีย...ให้ทุกสิ่งเป็นจริงได้

ttb spark คือ Digital Hub ของ ทีเอ็มบีธนชาต หรือ ทีทีบี (ttb) ที่มีความเชื่อและความมุ่งมั่นที่จะสร้าง การเปลี่ยนแปลงที่มีความหมาย ให้กับชีวิตของลูกค้า ผ่านดิจิทัลเทคโนโลยีและไอเดียที่สร้างสรรค์ โดยไม่ยึดติดกับกรอบความคิดเดิมๆ
 กล้าทำสิ่งใหม่ๆ ให้เกิดขึ้นจริง

ttb spark เน้นการทำงานแบบ Agile เพื่อพัฒนาโซลูชัน บริการ รวมไปถึงนวัตกรรมดิจิทัล ที่ตอบสนองกับการเปลี่ยนแปลงทางด้านเทคโนโลยี และความต้องการของลูกค้าที่รวดเร็ว เพื่อให้ลูกค้าของเรามีชีวิตทางการเงินที่ดีขึ้นอย่างแท้จริง

qualification: {"Responsibilities:Operate, maintain, and deploy applications in Application Server environments (WebLogic) with additional skills in WebSphere and DB2 as a valuable asset.Facilitate smooth deployment of applications and updates to Application Server environments.Utilize container platforms (Docker) and orchestration tools (Kubernetes) for application containerization and scaling.Leverage KVM (Kernel-based Virtual Machine) for virtualization, enhancing infrastructure efficiency.Troubleshoot and ensure the smooth operation of middleware systems.Manage security, automation, backup, and disaster recovery.Support CI/CD and infrastructure automation using Ansible.Control access permissions and provide timely incident resolution.Collaborate with IT teams to ensure the integrity and security of Middleware systems.Experience with KVM, WebSphere, and DB2 is advantageous.Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field; or equivalent work experience.Solid command of Linux operating systems, with the ability to diagnose and troubleshoot issues effectively.Extensive hands-on experience with AWS services, including VPC setup, Transit Gateway configuration, EC2 instance management, S3 data storage, ECS/EKS cluster orchestration, Lambda functions, ALB configuration, and Hybrid Cloud implementations.Familiarity with Oracle WebLogic (On-Premise) is a plus.Excellent communication skills and a collaborative mindset to effectively work within cross-functional teams.AWS certification(s) will be highly advantageous.": 'Operate, maintain, and deploy applications in Application Server environments (WebLogic) with additional skills in WebSphere and DB2 as a valuable asset.Facilitate smooth deployment of applications and updates to Application Server environments.Utilize container platforms (Docker) and orchestration tools (Kubernetes) for application containerization and scaling.Leverage KVM (Kernel-based Virtual Machine) for virtualization, enhancing infrastructure efficiency.Troubleshoot and ensure the smooth operation of middleware systems.Manage security, automation, backup, and disaster recovery.Support CI/CD and infrastructure automation using Ansible.Control access permissions and provide timely incident resolution.Collaborate with IT teams to ensure the integrity and security of Middleware systems.Experience with KVM, WebSphere, and DB2 is advantageous.'}

URGENTLY REQUIRED !!!
Muang Thai Life Assurance Public Company Limited is the first life insurance company to be granted Royal Patronage of H.M. The King to bear on its
 masthead the Royal Garuda. We are also the first life insurance company with the International Standard Certification, ISO 9001:2000. The operation of the company has expanded successfully countrywide by the operation of more than 100 branches under the visionary
 management of Mr. Photipong Lamsam, the Chairman, and Mr. Sara Lamsam, the President and Chief Executive Officer, with its current headquarter at 250 Rachadaphisek Road, Huaykwang, Bangkok 10310. 


The company will continue to develop our operation, human resource and customer service to further strengthen our position as
 a leading and financially sound insurance company. We also adhere to the good corporate governance in all aspects of the company’s development and we are proudly our slogan of  "Happiness
 Means Everything"

company_overview:
At TMBThanachart Bank (ttb), our mission is to help Thai people achieve better financial well-being as it is the foundation for reaching one's financial freedom and life’s
 goals. We are committed to making REAL change by shifting banking paradigm through combined expertise and core strengths of both banks.

Our successful merger makes us the 6th largest commercial bank in Thailand with more than 10 million customers who now have access to more comprehensive financial product and service offerings
 and even better customers experience through more online and offline channels coverage nationwide. We do our best to offer best financial solutions and provide superior customer experience, create sustainable growth for our shareholders and ensure good corporate
 governance as well as good corporate citizenship. We constantly design employees’ experiences via international and dynamic environment where all opinions matter and great performances counts. We always encourage our employees unleash their potentials by taking
 new initiatives to deliver best customer experiences. We look for candidate who believe in integrity, portrait challenge status quo attitude, work agile, show respect towards others, and value high quality on execution. TMBThanachart Bank (ttb),
 where you can BE YOUR BEST.

company_overview:
Cathcart Technology is an agile and independent technology recruitment consultancy headquartered in the UK. Since our establishment in 2009, the UK company was awarded with many recognitions
 and nominations. In 2015, we recognized a great opportunity for us to expand into the emerging technology market in Thailand. Ever since then, we are proud to say that we are playing a part in making Bangkok become one of the most important technology markets
 worldwide.
.
At Cathcart Technology, we specialize in sourcing and placing tech talents in a wide range of industries in Thailand, across a variety of business sectors from startups to enterprise organizations.
 As a boutique agency, we take immense pride in delivering highly professional and tailored services to both our valued clients and exceptional candidates.


Why choose us?

Expert Recruiters: 
Our team of experienced recruiters have a deep understanding of the Thai tech market and maintains a large database of highly qualified IT candidates.
Specialization:  With our specialization, strong work ethic, and years of experience, we are the best choice for matching the right talents with your organization and
 finding the ideal roles for our candidates. Extensive Resources:  We have invested heavily in our database and advertising reach to ensure that we have access to the best IT talents in Thailand to provide our
 clients with a competitive advantage to get ahead in the market. Streamlined Services:  We provide straightforward yet professional and effective services, throughout the recruitment process from start to finish.

Working and partnering with Cathcart Technology for seamless tech recruitment and thrive in the dynamic world of technology.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━ 
Visit our website: https://cathcarttechnology.co.th
LinkedIn : 
Cathcart Technology Thailand
Facebook : Cathcart Technology

company_overview:
Supara Group is a leading menswear apparel company in Southeast Asia with over 400 point-of-sales across Thailand, Philippines, Malaysia, and Indonesia. Established in the 1960s, Supara's
 brand portfolio includes GQ, Giffini, and CL Modern Simplicity.
Supara is vertically integrated with its own factories established across Thailand. This is to ensure our product is of the highest quality ranging from great design, comfortable fit,
 and detailed craftsmanship. Our growth strategy is to forge our expertise in developing technical and functional garments while creating a true omnichannel retail shopping experience for our customers.

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Application Specialist - Software, Programming / Software Development, Testing / QA
company_overview:
SS&C Technologies, Inc. (SS&C)
was founded in 1986 by William C. Stone, who has remained the company's CEO and Chairman of the Board since inception. SS&C first went public in 1996. In November 2005, the company
 was acquired by entities affiliated with The Carlyle Group and was taken private. On March 31, 2010, SS&C Technologies Holdings, Inc. began trading on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the ticker symbol "SSNC".
SS&C employs a disciplined and highly focused acquisition strategy to increase the breadth and depth of its products and services, and capitalize on evolving market opportunities. Since 1995, SS&C
 has acquired 50+ businesses with products, services and technologies in existing or complementary vertical markets. SS&C has more than 22,000+ employees worldwide, located in offices throughout North America, Europe, Asia, and Australia.
Website:
http://www.ssctech.com/
 About Us 
We’ve made it our business to know your business for more than 30 years.
Today’s global financial markets are faster paced, more complex and more competitive than ever. It’s a world that demands agility and precision. The margin for error is razor-thin, and there’s
 no time for downtime. The advantage goes to firms that can leverage technology to master complexity and overcome operational impediments to growth. 
SS&C has been helping investment and financial firms of all types gain that advantage for more than 30 years. Grounded in our deep knowledge and understanding of your business, our technology-powered
 solutions and services help you run your operations more efficiently, compete more effectively and grow more profitably. 
Through a combination of organic innovation and strategic acquisitions, we have assembled a comprehensive selection of technology and service capabilities, backed by industry-leading expertise.
 From this menu, we can build and support an operational platform customized to your needs, with deployment options based on your business objectives. 
Headquartered in Windsor, Connecticut, SS&C serves a worldwide clientele through a global network of offices. We are publicly listed on the NASDAQ (SSNC) and remain exclusively focused
 on the investment management and financial services industries.
Career 
Our people are at the cornerstone of our success. We have the dedication, drive and commitment to achieve exceptional performance and are empowered to deliver outstanding solutions
 for our clients. At the same time we are proud, positive and committed to our company and display high standards of ethical conduct at all times.
Due to our business expansion, we are looking for well-qualified and motivated individual to join our organization.
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Work from home, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

The candidate must have a good understanding of software and had previous implementation experience, with a strong interest in new & emerging technology.': 'The developer will play a crucial role in the growth of the company, working closely with the Managing Director and members of the team.', 'This is an exciting position, working for a fast-growing company, focusing on new implementation projects that are being rolled out across multiple countries. The job responsibilities include owning the design, technical configuration, development, and integration of the Warehouse Advantage (WA) software using SQL Server, Advantage Architect, Advantage Link, Page Editor, and related tools.': 'Work with line Managers and manage junior members to complete tasks to ensure project milestones and customer-related work is delivered on time.Configure the solution using the WA toolset (Advantage Architect, Page Editor, etc.).Work with other consultants/developers as part of the larger configuration/development phase in implementation projects.Participate in functional & technical discussions with the client, including integrating WA with MHE and ERP systems.Create optimized SQL functions, stored procedures, and queries based on specifications.Troubleshooting and Resolution of configuration and deployment issues.Test applications and provide quality assurance.Documentation of the configuration process of the software products to help with further project implementation.Create HTML5-based screens to present data grids and dashboards.Develop SSRS Reports.Convert business requirements into technical design documents using tools such as Microsoft Visio, Word, and Excel.Design processes using industry best practices, matching both the needs of the client and WA architecture standards.', 'Your responsibilities may also include developing project documentation, testing of the application, and training duties as required. Software Training will be provided for the successful candidate, so knowledge of the WMS toolset is an advantage but not a prerequisite.': 'Energetic and enthusiastic.Actively seeks to learn new skills.Taking pride in their work.Guidance, Training, and Supervision will be given but it is essential that self-initiative is used to be able to complete work.Strong Communication skills are required.', 'Qualifications': 'Excellent organizational skills with the ability to multitask.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.Ability to prioritize and work to deadlines.Excellent programming and IT development skills.Flexibility and adaptability.The ability to be proactive and take the initiative.', "Candidate must possess a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science/Information Technology/Computer engineering, Supply Chain Operations Management, Industrial Engineering, or any IT-related course.": 'Complete Warehouse Advantage Software Training Course/Certification.Work on Customer Projects and generate revenue minimum of 10,000 GBP.', '5 years + experience in MS SQL Server developing advanced SQL including stored procedures and functions for business-critical applications.': 'The Developer will receive a salary depending on experienceBonus 3% of the generated profit from the international project and\xa010% from the local projectWill receive Personal Social Security allowance.Group InsuranceTravel costs to and from Customer Sites will be expensed in full.Laptop will be provided.Provident fund (still working on it)'}

Leagility One is a Supply Chain IT Consultancy Company that develops software called
 Körber WMS used for the management of inbound and outbound warehouse operations founded in April 2021. We are linked to a UK Company Called Balloon One.

Balloon One was founded in 2003 and is based in West London. In total, we have a team of more than 50 highly skilled staff worldwide.

Part of a wider Network of Companies, with employees in the UK, Thailand, India, and Australia.

Working with Partner companies allows us to implement solutions globally using partners in Hong Kong, Vietnam, Singapore, Malaysia, South Africa, and Canada.

Visit our website:
www.balloonone.com

company_overview:
Why SLC?
SLC สยามเลเซอร์ คลินิก สถานพยาบาลความงาม ที่ได้รับความเชื่อมั่น ความไว้วางใจ จากผู้ที่ต้องการประสบการณ์จาก “ความสวย” มาตลอดระยะเวลากว่า 17 ปี ด้วยความชำนาญจากทีมแพทย์ผู้ชำนาญการ ทั้งทางด้าน
 ผิวพรรณ ศัลยกรรม ตกแต่ง ทั่วเรือนร่าง ประกอบกับเทคโนโลยีทางการแพทย์ที่ถูกคัดสรรอย่างมีประสิทธิภาพ ทันสมัย ปลอดเชื้ออุปกรณ์ทาง การแพทย์ด้วยมาตรฐานสากล (Fully Automatic Autoclave) ได้รับการรับรองเครื่องมือ แพทย์จากองค์การอาหารและยา ของประเทศไทย และ สหรัฐอเมริกา
 ตลอดจนสถานที่ให้บริการมีความสะอาดได้มาตรฐาน กระทรวงสาธารณสุข
SLC มุ่งมั่นในการให้บริการที่ตอบสนองความต้องการของลูกค้าให้เป็นที่น่าพึงพอใจ และ ปลอดภัย ผู้ที่ได้เข้ามารับบริการ จึงมีความเชื่อมั่น ตลอดจนถึงการบอกต่อ ทำให้มีผู้เข้ามารับบริการใหม่อย่างต่อเนื่อง
“เพราะเราจริงใจเลือกสรรเทคโนโลยีที่ดีที่สุด..เพื่อคุณ”
SLC ยินดีให้คำปรึกษาปัญหาความงามทั่วเรือนร่าง
ใบหน้า
ผิวพรรณ
รูปร่างสัดส่วน
ศัลยกรรม

company_overview:
ttb spark | จุดไอเดีย...ให้ทุกสิ่งเป็นจริงได้

ttb spark คือ Digital Hub ของ ทีเอ็มบีธนชาต หรือ ทีทีบี (ttb) ที่มีความเชื่อและความมุ่งมั่นที่จะสร้าง การเปลี่ยนแปลงที่มีความหมาย ให้กับชีวิตของลูกค้า ผ่านดิจิทัลเทคโนโลยีและไอเดียที่สร้างสรรค์ โดยไม่ยึดติดกับกรอบความคิดเดิมๆ
 กล้าทำสิ่งใหม่ๆ ให้เกิดขึ้นจริง

ttb spark เน้นการทำงานแบบ Agile เพื่อพัฒนาโซลูชัน บริการ รวมไปถึงนวัตกรรมดิจิทัล ที่ตอบสนองกับการเปลี่ยนแปลงทางด้านเทคโนโลยี และความต้องการของลูกค้าที่รวดเร็ว เพื่อให้ลูกค้าของเรามีชีวิตทางการเงินที่ดีขึ้นอย่างแท้จริง

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Application Specialist - Software, Support, IT Consulting
company_overview:
ATA IT Ltd. (National Bank of Canada Group) established
 in Thailand on February 2016 will be acting as an “IT hub” or “IT center” for commercial banks and other companies in South East Asia and Pacific Ocean areas.

National Bank of Canada (BNC) is
 the major shareholder and parent company of ATA IT LIMITED. BNC is an integrated provider of financial services to retail, commercial, corporate and institutional clients.

National Bank is the leading bank in Quebec and the partner of choice for small and medium-sized enterprises. It is also the sixth
 largest bank in Canada with branches in almost every province. Clients in the United States, Europe and other parts of the world are served through a network of representative offices, subsidiaries and partnerships.

Its head office is located in Montreal and its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange.

With $232 billion in assets as at October 31, 2016, National Bank of Canada, together with its subsidiaries, forms one of Canada's
 leading integrated financial groups. The Bank has more than 21,000 employees and is widely recognized as a top employer. Its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX: NA). Follow the Bank's activities at nbc.ca or via social media such as Facebook,
 LinkedIn and Twitter.

ATA IT Limited offers the structure for professional growth, with the necessary support for full development of abilities, while valuing
 team work, leadership and commitment.

If you are looking for a challenging opportunity to develop yourself, to learn, and to achieve professional success, join us!
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Transportation allowance, Work from home, Five-day work week

qualification: {'Senior Frontend Developer (React/ VanillaJS)Salary from 40,000 - 70,000 THB \xa0Location: Chaing Mai (Hybrid work)JAC Recruitment is helping an international company in gaming / CMS web/mobile applications find potential sr. frontend developer (react) to help develop new/existing robust products to be more competitive in the market.\xa0Responsibilities:\xa0\xa0Develop and maintain quality, scalable and extendable ReactJS or React Typescript solutionsDevelop new features or modifying logics in existing applications.Collaborate with the development team as well as Product Owner, Business Analyst, System Analyst during planning sessions to clearly understand the requirementsKeep up with industry best practices, new knowledge, new techniques and can apply them to your work with the agreement from the team.\xa0Requirements:Bachelor in computer science, computer engineer, or a relevant field \xa03-5 years of experience in software frontend development using React, Vanilla Javascript / HTML / CSSSolid experience with REST web services and web APIsKnowledge of OOP and Data Management is a huge plus, but not mandatoryGood understanding of agile methodologies, with Kanban system is a plusCan work in a team environment to meet requirements working to a timeline.Business English is a mustInterested candidate, please send your resume in English (Word format only) along with your recent photo and expected salary to us by APPLY NOWJAC Personnel Recruitment Ltd10F Emporium Tower\xa0 622 Sukhumvit Soi 24 Klongton, Klongtoey, Bangkok 10110Contact : K. job_functions: Information Technology (IT), IT Auditing
company_overview:
Kiatnakin Phatra Financial Group is a merger of a commercial bank operated by Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Plc., and a capital market business operated
 by KKP Capital Plc. and Kiatnakin Phatra Securities Plc., a leading company in securities brokerage business in Thailand. Kiatnakin Phatra Financial Group is listed in the Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET) as "KKP."


Kiatnakin Phatra Financial Group fully operates businesses in financial and capital markets, focusing on expertise and wide range of services
 covering all needs of customers, including individuals, businesses, and domestic and transnational institutions. We support the excellence in our core businesses, utilize full potential and expertise in business operations, and do our best to develop money
 markets, capital markets, and the nation's economy in order to maximize the benefits towards customers, employees, and shareholders under our good corporate governance. We are ready to optimise opportunities for maximum benefits towards customers.


Our KKP is an organization with full of opportunities to learn (Freedom to Learn, Freedom to Grow). We do not stop the development of procedures and create learning
 on a regular basis. Not only extending the growth of your career path, but we also encourage everyone to share knowledge with each other, resulting in continuous and sustainable development under mutual respect. We work with transparency, without politics.
 We work extreamly but not seriously. Dress in your own style everyday. (Freedom to Dress)         
                                                                                                                                 
If you are looking for an organization that is independent and has a working atmosphere like this ... JOIN US.


กลุ่มธุรกิจการเงินเกียรตินาคินภัทร เกิดขึ้นจากการร่วมกิจการระหว่าง ธนาคารเกียรตินาคินภัทร จำกัด (มหาชน) และธุรกิจตลาดทุนที่ดำเนินการภายใต้บริษัท เคเคพี แคปปิตอล 
 จำกัด (มหาชน)  และบริษัทหลักทรัพย์ เกียรตินาคินภัทร จำกัด (มหาชน) ซึ่งเป็นผู้นำด้านธุรกิจหลักทรัพย์ในประเทศไทย ภายใต้ชื่อ “KKP”


KKP ดำเนินธุรกิจการเงิน และธุรกิจตลาดทุน อย่างเต็มรูปแบบ มุ่งเน้นความเชี่ยวชาญในการให้บริการ ตอบโจทย์ลูกค้าทุกประเภท ทั้งลูกค้าบุคคล ลูกค้าธุรกิจ และลูกค้าสถาบันทั้งในและนอกประเทศ
 พร้อมส่งเสริม พัฒนาตลาดเงิน ตลาดทุน และเศรษฐกิจของประเทศให้เกิดประโยชน์สูงสุด ทั้งต่อลูกค้า พนักงาน และผู้ถือหุ้น ภายใต้หลักธรรมาภิบาลที่ดี เราพร้อมสร้างโอกาสที่ดีที่สุด เพื่อประโยชน์สูงสุดของลูกค้า


KKP ของเรา เป็นองค์กรที่เต็มไปด้วยโอกาสแห่งการเรียนรู้ (Freedom to Learn, Freedom to Grow) เราไม่หยุดการพัฒนา ปรับปรุงกระบวนงาน และสร้างการเรียนรู้ให้เกิดขึ้นอย่างสม่ำเสมอ
 ไม่เพียงต่อยอดการเติบโตในเส้นทางอาชีพของตนเอง แต่เรายังสนับสนุนให้ทุกคนแบ่งปันความรู้ซึ่งกันและกัน ก่อให้เกิดการพัฒนาอย่างต่อเนื่องและยั่งยืน ภายใต้การเคารพซึ่งกันและกัน ที่นี่เราทำงานกันอย่างจริงจัง แต่ไม่เคร่งเครียด เราแต่งกายตาม style  ของตัวเองได้ในทุกๆ
 วัน (Freedom to Dress)


หากคุณกำลังมองหาองค์กร ที่มีอิสระ มีบรรยากาศแบบนี้ในการทำงานแบบนี้ … มาร่วมงานกับเรานะคะ
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Five-day work week

qualification: {"Role Summary- Define and supervise Information Technology strategic plans and master plans by providing control, monitoring and reporting operations by focusing on maximizing benefits for the Bank.- Coordinate with other departments as well as providing advice and supervise projects under Information Technology master plan to be able to proceed according to functional goals and strategies.- Manage Information Technology Group to deliver high quality and high security in IT operational processes. Be a consultant and participate with other teams in Information Technology Group.- Plan, manage and set the Bank's Information Technology policy and focus on efficiency and effectivenessaccording to the Bank's Information Technology strategy and policy framework.- Supervise, control and enhance the quality of customer service through the Bank's information systems, consistent with the Bank's business strategy.Role and Responsibilities / หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบ:\xa01. Enterprise Architecture1.1\xa0\xa0\xa0 Define architecture and technology roadmap and drive activity to transform organization to the roadmap.1.2\xa0\xa0\xa0 Build core IT asset such as common service, cloud-native platform, and core knowledge.2. IT Partnership2.1 Plan and analyze business needs and design requirements for the entire work system for the business of connecting services for financial transactions. Offering and servicing banking products through other service providers Including various projects of relevant government agencies.2.2 Manager and supervise team to support for the design of sales processes and related services to support the new system.2.3 Plan and manage projects and human resources to deliver quality work according to the specified plan and achieve the objectives of the project.3. IT Project Management Office3.1 Manage and oversee business projects and ensure that are completed on time and within budget.3.2 Manage and supervise team to collaborate with department leaders to define, prioritize, and develop projects.3.3 Plan and analyze project implementation, including budgets, risks, project evaluation, lesson learn and post implementation.4. Management4.1 Manage and monitor on the implementation of annual and short-term strategic plans that is consistent with the business in order to achieve the highest benefit for business operations.4.2 Supervise and support operational strategic planning and assist Management in compliance with the Information Technology strategic plan.4.3 Manage team performance as well as supervise, follow up and evaluate the performance of the team according to the objectives and performance indicators.4.4 Manage the resources, including time, personal and tools for maximum benefit.5. Operational Process5.1 Supervise and advise the team to work efficiently and effectiveness.5.2 Initiate and propose guidelines and development plans in new Information Technology processes to support business needs.5.3 Evaluate and propose appropriate technology to increase the efficiency of the Bank's operations and provide a sustainable IT architecture to create benefits for the Bank.5.4 Manage and supervise the IT Operational Process in accordance with the process and objectives, strictly established, especially with respect to the risks and security arising under the IT work.5.5 Supervise, control and supervise the project management in the department to be according to the plan and achieve objectives.6. Communication and other aspects6.1 Participate in IT meetings and attend relevant events, including supervision team and work as assigned.6.2 Be a consultant or middleman in solving problems between departments related to IT processes and IT systems.6.3 Develop and promote team skills improvement, including technical skills and soft skills.Qualifications / คุณสมบัติ:\xa0\xa0 (ควรเรียงลำดับข้อมูลดังนี้)\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 Master's degree or higher in Information Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering or other related fields.\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0 At least 10 years’ experience in Information Technology System Management related to Project Management. job_functions: Information Technology (IT), IT Project Management / Team Lead, IT Consulting
company_overview:
Kiatnakin Phatra Financial Group is a merger of a commercial bank operated by Kiatnakin Phatra Bank Plc., and a capital market business operated
 by KKP Capital Plc. and Kiatnakin Phatra Securities Plc., a leading company in securities brokerage business in Thailand. Kiatnakin Phatra Financial Group is listed in the Stock Exchange of Thailand (SET) as "KKP."


Kiatnakin Phatra Financial Group fully operates businesses in financial and capital markets, focusing on expertise and wide range of services
 covering all needs of customers, including individuals, businesses, and domestic and transnational institutions. We support the excellence in our core businesses, utilize full potential and expertise in business operations, and do our best to develop money
 markets, capital markets, and the nation's economy in order to maximize the benefits towards customers, employees, and shareholders under our good corporate governance. We are ready to optimise opportunities for maximum benefits towards customers.


Our KKP is an organization with full of opportunities to learn (Freedom to Learn, Freedom to Grow). We do not stop the development of procedures and create learning
 on a regular basis. Not only extending the growth of your career path, but we also encourage everyone to share knowledge with each other, resulting in continuous and sustainable development under mutual respect. We work with transparency, without politics.
 We work extreamly but not seriously. Dress in your own style everyday. (Freedom to Dress)         
                                                                                                                                 
If you are looking for an organization that is independent and has a working atmosphere like this ... JOIN US.


กลุ่มธุรกิจการเงินเกียรตินาคินภัทร เกิดขึ้นจากการร่วมกิจการระหว่าง ธนาคารเกียรตินาคินภัทร จำกัด (มหาชน) และธุรกิจตลาดทุนที่ดำเนินการภายใต้บริษัท เคเคพี แคปปิตอล 
 จำกัด (มหาชน)  และบริษัทหลักทรัพย์ เกียรตินาคินภัทร จำกัด (มหาชน) ซึ่งเป็นผู้นำด้านธุรกิจหลักทรัพย์ในประเทศไทย ภายใต้ชื่อ “KKP”


KKP ดำเนินธุรกิจการเงิน และธุรกิจตลาดทุน อย่างเต็มรูปแบบ มุ่งเน้นความเชี่ยวชาญในการให้บริการ ตอบโจทย์ลูกค้าทุกประเภท ทั้งลูกค้าบุคคล ลูกค้าธุรกิจ และลูกค้าสถาบันทั้งในและนอกประเทศ
 พร้อมส่งเสริม พัฒนาตลาดเงิน ตลาดทุน และเศรษฐกิจของประเทศให้เกิดประโยชน์สูงสุด ทั้งต่อลูกค้า พนักงาน และผู้ถือหุ้น ภายใต้หลักธรรมาภิบาลที่ดี เราพร้อมสร้างโอกาสที่ดีที่สุด เพื่อประโยชน์สูงสุดของลูกค้า


KKP ของเรา เป็นองค์กรที่เต็มไปด้วยโอกาสแห่งการเรียนรู้ (Freedom to Learn, Freedom to Grow) เราไม่หยุดการพัฒนา ปรับปรุงกระบวนงาน และสร้างการเรียนรู้ให้เกิดขึ้นอย่างสม่ำเสมอ
 ไม่เพียงต่อยอดการเติบโตในเส้นทางอาชีพของตนเอง แต่เรายังสนับสนุนให้ทุกคนแบ่งปันความรู้ซึ่งกันและกัน ก่อให้เกิดการพัฒนาอย่างต่อเนื่องและยั่งยืน ภายใต้การเคารพซึ่งกันและกัน ที่นี่เราทำงานกันอย่างจริงจัง แต่ไม่เคร่งเครียด เราแต่งกายตาม style  ของตัวเองได้ในทุกๆ
 วัน (Freedom to Dress)


หากคุณกำลังมองหาองค์กร ที่มีอิสระ มีบรรยากาศแบบนี้ในการทำงานแบบนี้ … มาร่วมงานกับเรานะคะ

position: IT Support - User Access Management (Assistant Manager/Team Lead)
job_highlight: Experience in leading team/Strong knowledge and expertise in Active Directory/Good command of English
job_desc: {'Job Description:\xa0': ['Collaborate in the administration of user identities and access privileges within the MINOR International Group systems and applications, providing strategic oversight and guidance.\xa0', 'Supervise the creation, modification, and deactivation of user accounts based on approved requests and policies, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.\xa0', 'Lead periodic access reviews and audits, taking a proactive approach to ensure strict compliance with security standards and access control policies, and providing actionable insights for improvement.\xa0'], 'Qualifications\xa0': ['Strategically manage the process of user onboarding and offboarding, including overseeing account setup, access provisioning, and revocation, with a focus on efficiency and compliance.\xa0', 'Collaborate closely with HR, IT, and other relevant departments to ensure seamless coordination for timely and accurate provisioning and de-provisioning of user accounts, aligning with organizational policies and priorities.\xa0']}
qualification: {"The Assistant Manager - Identity and Access Management is entrusted with overseeing and ensuring the secure and efficient management of user identities and access privileges within the MINOR International Group, with a dedicated emphasis on integrating and optimizing Microsoft Office 365 (O365) solutions. This encompasses the implementation and maintenance of robust controls and processes to safeguard sensitive information and systems from unauthorized access, with a particular focus on O365 environments. Additionally, the Assistant Manager assumes the responsibility of providing leadership by supervising a team of IAM Officers, ensuring the effective execution of identity and access management functions, especially within the O365 framework. This pivotal role necessitates close collaboration with cross-functional teams to establish and enforce identity and access management policies and procedures, all while delivering essential support and guidance to users.\xa0\xa0In performing these duties, the Assistant Manager plays a critical role in upholding the security and integrity of MINOR International Group's digital ecosystem. Leveraging O365 solutions, they contribute to a robust identity and access management framework that fortifies defenses against unauthorized access, data breaches, and other security risks.\xa0Job Description:\xa0Identity and Access Control Administration:\xa0Collaborate in the administration of user identities and access privileges within the MINOR International Group systems and applications, providing strategic oversight and guidance.\xa0Supervise the creation, modification, and deactivation of user accounts based on approved requests and policies, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.\xa0Lead periodic access reviews and audits, taking a proactive approach to ensure strict compliance with security standards and access control policies, and providing actionable insights for improvement.\xa0\xa0User Provisioning and De-Provisioning:\xa0Strategically manage the process of user onboarding and offboarding, including overseeing account setup, access provisioning, and revocation, with a focus on efficiency and compliance.\xa0Collaborate closely with HR, IT, and other relevant departments to ensure seamless coordination for timely and accurate provisioning and de-provisioning of user accounts, aligning with organizational policies and priorities.\xa0\xa0Access Request and Incident Management:\xa0Strategically oversee the process of receiving and processing access requests from users, ensuring proper approvals and thorough documentation.\xa0Lead the investigation and resolution of access-related incidents, including account lockouts, password resets, and access violations, with a focus on swift and effective solutions.\xa0Foster collaboration with the IT support team, providing leadership in addressing user access issues and ensuring timely resolution to minimize business disruption.\xa0\xa0Security Group and Distribution Group Management:\xa0Provide strategic oversight in managing security groups and Distribution Groups within the MINOR International Group systems and applications.\xa0Lead the process of creating, modifying, and deleting security groups and Distribution Groups based on business requirements, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.\xa0Determine and assign appropriate access permissions and privileges to security groups, prioritizing security and efficiency.\xa0Conduct regular reviews and updates of security group memberships to guarantee accuracy and compliance with organizational standards.\xa0Oversee the management of distribution group memberships, ensuring proper email routing to optimize communication channels.\xa0Proactively monitor and maintain distribution group usage to enhance the effectiveness of communication channels.\xa0\xa0Office 365 Solution Specialist:\xa0Provide dedicated support for Office 365 (O365) solutions within the MINOR International Group's systems and applications, ensuring seamless integration and optimized functionality.\xa0Assist in the configuration, troubleshooting, and maintenance of O365 user accounts, licenses, and applications, aligning with business requirements and organizational objectives.\xa0Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement and customize O365 features and functionalities, enhancing productivity and operational efficiency.\xa0Monitor O365 service health and performance, proactively identifying and resolving any issues to minimize business disruption.\xa0Stay updated with industry trends and best practices related to O365 solutions, recommending enhancements and optimizations to support organizational objectives.\xa0Qualifications\xa0Bachelor's degree or Master's degree in Information Management, Computer Science, or IT-related fields; an advanced degree is preferred.\xa0Strong knowledge and expertise in Active Directory, information technology applications, systems, Microsoft O365 configuration and integration and technologies within the retail or associated industry.\xa0Strong understanding of identity and access management principles, practices, and technologies.\xa0\xa0Experience in managing user access, provisioning, de-provisioning, and enforcing access controls.\xa0\xa0Solid knowledge of IT systems, networks, and security technologies, as well as familiarity with IAM tools and security mechanisms.\xa0\xa0Understand HR onboarding and offboarding process.\xa0Experience in managing Active directory, Officer 365 solution (exchange online), AD manager and understanding user authorization and user permission\xa0Strong interpersonal and communication skills to collaborate effectively with stakeholders and provide user training.\xa0\xa0Good human relations skills to effectively interact with personnel throughout the technology and customer departments with good oral and written communication skills.\xa0Ability to work in a changing environment under pressure and within challenging timescales.\xa0Good in English language both spoken and written.Bachelor's degree or Master's degree in Information Management, Computer Science, or IT-related fields; an advanced degree is preferred.\xa0Strong knowledge and expertise in Active Directory, information technology applications, systems, Microsoft O365 configuration and integration and technologies within the retail or associated industry.": 'Collaborate in the administration of user identities and access privileges within the MINOR International Group systems and applications, providing strategic oversight and guidance.\xa0Supervise the creation, modification, and deactivation of user accounts based on approved requests and policies, ensuring alignment with organizational objectives.\xa0Lead periodic access reviews and audits, taking a proactive approach to ensure strict compliance with security standards and access control policies, and providing actionable insights for improvement.\xa0'}

company_overview:
Bluebik Group is a young & innovative consulting firm led by a team of consultants with vast experience in developing competitive strategy and managing various large-scale implementation
 projects for leading institutions in Thailand. With diverse backgrounds, our highly skilled team aims to deliver on our company’s promise: "to develop and implement innovative strategy that best meet the needs of our clients." We recognize that each organization
 has its own unique set of challenges. Therefore, our team specializes in providing our clients with customized, state-of-the-art solutions that enable organizations to remain competitive amidst the fast changing marketplace.
Our leadership team is very committed to developing our people. We spend significant amount of our time on training and 1-on-1 coaching to make sure that we can bring out the best in the
 team. We also invest in our unique culture, bringing the best of both startup and corporate worlds.

job_highlight: 14 days annual leave (increase 1 every year)/Group insurance (OPD,IPD,Dental,Life), PVD/WFH policy/International Working Environment
job_desc: {'We are looking to recruit DB2 DBA': ["Responsible for implementation, maintenance and repair of our commercial bank's database.", 'Maintain confidentiality with regard to the information being processed, stored or accessed by the network.', 'Monitoring and improving database performance and capacity.', 'Co-ordinate and implement security measures to safeguard the database.', 'Write and maintain documentation, document problems and resolutions for future reference.', 'Analyze and evaluate present or proposed business procedures or problems to define needs.', 'Conduct technical research on system upgrades to determine feasibility, cost, time required, and compatibility with current system.', 'Disaster recovery (backups and testing of backups), performance analysis and tuning, data dictionary maintenance.', 'Install / Upgrade new versions of DBMS, application software, and other software related to DBMS administration.', 'Test new software before it is moved into a production environment.', 'Work closely with the system and network administrator to perform software installations, and to configure hardware and software.\xa0', 'Proactively monitor systems for optimum performance and capacity constraints.', 'Database Availability: Tasks involve the administration and configuration of databases; troubleshooting; and liaising with the application support team, network team and system support team to ensure uptime of the network; and problem-solving, occasionally escalating issues to the vendor for support.', 'Service Delivery: The role incumbent is required to ensure that the capacity and performance of the database is available in order for customers to use all applications at all times; they are also responsible for managing the performance and capacity of this database, e.g. make sure the database responds efficiently and performs as per user expectations. In addition, they will also be doing regular performance tuning and maintenance checks to ensure this performance.', 'Compliance & Security: The role involves making sure the databases comply with all relevant security standards, thus ensuring proper controls/rights are in place for users and administrators. The incumbent will need to apply the right levels of relevant service patches and packs, in accordance with Bank and best-practice policies and standards.\xa0', 'Other assignments by company/ team lead', 'Be able to do on call support and 24/7 standby if required.'], 'Job Description': ['Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or equivalent fields.', 'At least 3 years experiences in database technologies: IBM DB2 for UNIX/Windows, DB2 Connect, DB2 Federation, DB2 Replication', 'Good Knowledge in Shell script bash/ksh, Perl, Python', 'IBM Certified Database Administrator - DB2 for Unix/Windows is a plus.', 'Good knowledge in Network & Security concept', 'Good command of English to contact with international team.'], 'Qualification': ['14 days’ vacation in first year', 'Health insurance for staff & families', 'Life insurance', 'Dental fee for staff & families', 'Provident fund', 'Annual Party', 'Annual Health Check', 'Monetary Assistance (Childbirth, Funeral, Marriage)', 'Monthly Activities- Staff Birthday & Company Activities', 'Work from Home policy']}
qualification: {"We are looking to recruit DB2 DBA\xa0\xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 ATA-IT\xa0Limited- the subsidiary of National Bank of\xa0Canada (NBC).\xa0Currently, we\xa0are\xa0looking for Database Administrator to join our team. We are looking to see you be a member of National Bank of Canada.\xa0Job DescriptionResponsible for implementation, maintenance and repair of our commercial bank's database.Maintain confidentiality with regard to the information being processed, stored or accessed by the network.Monitoring and improving database performance and capacity.Co-ordinate and implement security measures to safeguard the database.Write and maintain documentation, document problems and resolutions for future reference.Analyze and evaluate present or proposed business procedures or problems to define needs.Conduct technical research on system upgrades to determine feasibility, cost, time required, and compatibility with current system.Disaster recovery (backups and testing of backups), performance analysis and tuning, data dictionary maintenance.Install / Upgrade new versions of DBMS, application software, and other software related to DBMS administration.Test new software before it is moved into a production environment.Work closely with the system and network administrator to perform software installations, and to configure hardware and software.\xa0Proactively monitor systems for optimum performance and capacity constraints.Database Availability: Tasks involve the administration and configuration of databases; troubleshooting; and liaising with the application support team, network team and system support team to ensure uptime of the network; and problem-solving, occasionally escalating issues to the vendor for support.Service Delivery: The role incumbent is required to ensure that the capacity and performance of the database is available in order for customers to use all applications at all times; they are also responsible for managing the performance and capacity of this database, e.g. make sure the database responds efficiently and performs as per user expectations. In addition, they will also be doing regular performance tuning and maintenance checks to ensure this performance.Compliance & Security: The role involves making sure the databases comply with all relevant security standards, thus ensuring proper controls/rights are in place for users and administrators. The incumbent will need to apply the right levels of relevant service patches and packs, in accordance with Bank and best-practice policies and standards.\xa0Other assignments by company/ team leadBe able to do on call support and 24/7 standby if required.QualificationBachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or equivalent fields.At least 3 years experiences in database technologies: IBM DB2 for UNIX/Windows, DB2 Connect, DB2 Federation, DB2 ReplicationGood Knowledge in Shell script bash/ksh, Perl, PythonIBM Certified Database Administrator - DB2 for Unix/Windows is a plus.Good knowledge in Network & Security conceptGood command of English to contact with international team.What you will get from ATA IT\xa014 days’ vacation in first job_functions: Information Technology (IT), DBA, IT Consulting
company_overview:
ATA IT Ltd. (National Bank of Canada Group) established
 in Thailand on February 2016 will be acting as an “IT hub” or “IT center” for commercial banks and other companies in South East Asia and Pacific Ocean areas.

National Bank of Canada (BNC) is
 the major shareholder and parent company of ATA IT LIMITED. BNC is an integrated provider of financial services to retail, commercial, corporate and institutional clients.

National Bank is the leading bank in Quebec and the partner of choice for small and medium-sized enterprises. It is also the sixth
 largest bank in Canada with branches in almost every province. Clients in the United States, Europe and other parts of the world are served through a network of representative offices, subsidiaries and partnerships.

Its head office is located in Montreal and its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange.

With $232 billion in assets as at October 31, 2016, National Bank of Canada, together with its subsidiaries, forms one of Canada's
 leading integrated financial groups. The Bank has more than 21,000 employees and is widely recognized as a top employer. Its securities are listed on the Toronto Stock Exchange (TSX: NA). Follow the Bank's activities at nbc.ca or via social media such as Facebook,
 LinkedIn and Twitter.

ATA IT Limited offers the structure for professional growth, with the necessary support for full development of abilities, while valuing
 team work, leadership and commitment.

If you are looking for a challenging opportunity to develop yourself, to learn, and to achieve professional success, join us!
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Work from home, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

job_highlight: Experience in security Operation Center/Background knowledge on IT infrastructure/Good command in English
qualification: {'Prime Function :2nd level support of company’s cybersecurityResponsibility :Strictly follow the GPV Group Code of Conduct.Ensure that you have been trained and strictly follow our safety rules and workplace.Ensure compliance with the company’s management system, policies and rules.Cybersecurity incidents and vulnerabilities analyst.Performing preventive measures, system monitoring, and data analysis, reviewing network activity, and looking for potential threats.Ensure that daily IT operations and tasks are properly compliance with the security matter.Conduct vulnerability assessments of IT systems and prioritize vulnerabilities for remediation.Qualification\xa0:Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Information System or related fields.Experience in security Operation Center, Cybersecurity analysis.Experience with computer network penetration testing and techniques.Understanding of ISO27001, firewalls, proxies, SIEM, antivirus, protocols, and IDPS concepts.Ability to identify and mitigate network vulnerabilities and explain how to avoid them.Understanding of patch management with the ability to deploy patches in a timely manner while understanding business impact.Background knowledge on IT infrastructure such as network, endpoint, system, cloud applications.Analytical and problem-solving skills are required.Good command in English.You are most welcome to contact us for further information’s or visit our website at WWW.GPV-GROUP.COMPlease send your application form and CV via APPLY NOWPLEASE READ THROUGH THE ENTIRE JOB DESCRIPTION BEFORE APPLYING.All Applicants should have requirement qualification as below and applications must be in English languageWe offer attractive remuneration for the right candidates. Please submit your resume and photo by clicking on "Apply Now"834 Moo 4 , Bangpoo Industrial Estate\xa0 Soi 11-12\xa0Sukhumvit Road,\xa0 Praksa Muang Dist., Samutprakarn 10280\xa0Tel : 0-2709-2550 Fax : 0-2709-2564': '2nd level support of company’s cybersecurity', 'Prime Function :': 'Strictly follow the GPV Group Code of Conduct.Ensure that you have been trained and strictly follow our safety rules and workplace.Ensure compliance with the company’s management system, policies and rules.Cybersecurity incidents and vulnerabilities analyst.Performing preventive measures, system monitoring, and data analysis, reviewing network activity, and looking for potential threats.Ensure that daily IT operations and tasks are properly compliance with the security matter.Conduct vulnerability assessments of IT systems and prioritize vulnerabilities for remediation.', '2nd level support of company’s cybersecurity': 'Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Computer Information System or related fields.Experience in security Operation Center, Cybersecurity analysis.Experience with computer network penetration testing and techniques.Understanding of ISO27001, firewalls, proxies, SIEM, antivirus, protocols, and IDPS concepts.Ability to identify and mitigate network vulnerabilities and explain how to avoid them.Understanding of patch management with the ability to deploy patches in a timely manner while understanding business impact.Background knowledge on IT infrastructure such as network, endpoint, system, cloud applications.Analytical and problem-solving skills are required.Good command in English.'}

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Application Specialist - Software, DBA, Others
company_overview:
SS&C Technologies, Inc. (SS&C)
was founded in 1986 by William C. Stone, who has remained the company's CEO and Chairman of the Board since inception. SS&C first went public in 1996. In November 2005, the company was acquired by entities affiliated with The Carlyle Group and
 was taken private. On March 31, 2010, SS&C Technologies Holdings, Inc. began trading on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the ticker symbol "SSNC".
SS&C employs a disciplined and highly focused acquisition strategy to increase the breadth and depth of its products and services, and capitalize on evolving market opportunities. Since
 1995, SS&C has acquired 50+ businesses with products, services and technologies in existing or complementary vertical markets. SS&C has more than 22,000+ employees worldwide, located in offices throughout North America, Europe, Asia, and Australia.
Website:
http://www.ssctech.com/
 About Us 
We’ve made it our business to know your business for more than 30 years.
Today’s global financial markets are faster paced, more complex and more competitive than ever. It’s a world that demands agility and precision. The margin for error is razor-thin, and
 there’s no time for downtime. The advantage goes to firms that can leverage technology to master complexity and overcome operational impediments to growth. 
SS&C has been helping investment and financial firms of all types gain that advantage for more than 30 years. Grounded in our deep knowledge and understanding of your business, our technology-powered
 solutions and services help you run your operations more efficiently, compete more effectively and grow more profitably. 
Through a combination of organic innovation and strategic acquisitions, we have assembled a comprehensive selection of technology and service capabilities, backed by industry-leading expertise.
 From this menu, we can build and support an operational platform customized to your needs, with deployment options based on your business objectives. 
Headquartered in Windsor, Connecticut, SS&C serves a worldwide clientele through a global network of offices. We are publicly listed on the NASDAQ (SSNC) and remain exclusively
 focused on the investment management and financial services industries.
Career 
Our people are at the cornerstone of our success. We have the dedication, drive and commitment to achieve exceptional performance and are empowered to deliver outstanding solutions
 for our clients. At the same time we are proud, positive and committed to our company and display high standards of ethical conduct at all times.
We believe that the key to our future success lies in the caliber of the people we employ, and as such we offer a wide range of benefits to ensure high-achievers are rewarded:

Excellent base salaries
Performance related annual bonuses
Provident fund
International Career opportunities
Comprehensive training plans
Overseas training and international business travel
Social functions and team activities
Life/accidental/disability insurance
Medical insurance (employee, spouse with marriage certificate and children) / Optical care
Annual leave

Due to our business expansion, we are looking for well-qualified and motivated individual to join our organization.
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Work from home, Five-day work week, Flexible working hours

job_functions: Information Technology (IT), Application Specialist - Software, Support, Programming / Software Development
company_overview:
Krungsri is a strategic member of MUFG Bank, Ltd. (MUFG Bank), a wholly-owned subsidiary of Mitsubishi
 UFJ Financial Group (MUFG) – Japan’s largest financial group and one of the world’s financial groups with the most varied financial services and products. As of the end of 2018, the Bank’s registered capital totaled 75,741 million baht, while our paid-up capital
 reached 73,558 million baht. Krungsri is Thailand’s fifth largest commercial bank in terms of assets, loans, and deposits.
We are passionate about meeting and acquiring talents. No matter who you are, gender, race, age, religion;
 We embrace all differences and diversity. Door of opportunities at Krungsri family are open for everyone who are looking to challenge themselves regardless of individual differences by using their best endeavors to achieve excellence and mutual success with
 us. That is our Krungsri DNA.
At Krungsri, employees are also considered as key stakeholders and valuable resources of the Bank. They
 play vital roles in driving the organization towards business targets and the organization is unlikely to achieve stability if its employees lack development. The Bank’s employees are also essential indicators of its directions and successes in the future.
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Flexible working hours

 About Us 
We’ve made it our business to know your business for more than 30 years.
Today’s global financial markets are faster paced, more complex and more competitive than ever. It’s a world that demands agility and precision. The margin for error is razor-thin, and
 there’s no time for downtime. The advantage goes to firms that can leverage technology to master complexity and overcome operational impediments to growth. 
SS&C has been helping investment and financial firms of all types gain that advantage for more than 30 years. Grounded in our deep knowledge and understanding of your business, our technology-powered
 solutions and services help you run your operations more efficiently, compete more effectively and grow more profitably. 
Through a combination of organic innovation and strategic acquisitions, we have assembled a comprehensive selection of technology and service capabilities, backed by industry-leading expertise.
 From this menu, we can build and support an operational platform customized to your needs, with deployment options based on your business objectives. 
Headquartered in Windsor, Connecticut, SS&C serves a worldwide clientele through a global network of offices. We are publicly listed on the NASDAQ (SSNC) and remain exclusively
 focused on the investment management and financial services industries.
Career 
Our people are at the cornerstone of our success. We have the dedication, drive and commitment to achieve exceptional performance and are empowered to deliver outstanding solutions
 for our clients. At the same time we are proud, positive and committed to our company and display high standards of ethical conduct at all times.
We believe that the key to our future success lies in the caliber of the people we employ, and as such we offer a wide range of benefits to ensure high-achievers are rewarded:

Excellent base salaries
Performance related annual bonuses
Provident fund
International Career opportunities
Comprehensive training plans
Overseas training and international business travel
Social functions and team activities
Life/accidental/disability insurance
Medical insurance (employee, spouse with marriage certificate and children) / Optical care
Annual leave

Due to our business expansion, we are looking for well-qualified and motivated individual to join our organization.
company_benefits_incentives: Dental insurance, Life insurance, Medical insurance, Performance bonus, Work from home, Flexible working hours

job_highlight: Enterprise Architecture/Technology Governance/Digital Transformation
job_desc: {'Key Responsibilities:': ['Assist in developing and defining an EA strategy in line with retail business and digital transformation goals.', 'Support the architectural review and governance processes, ensuring projects and programs align with the EA strategy.', 'Contribute to technology decisions, focusing on retail-specific requirements such as e-commerce platforms, supply chain management, customer experience technologies, and data analytics.', 'Collaborate with business and IT teams under the guidance of senior architects to support technology direction, standards, and roadmaps.', 'Help in the implementation and monitoring of new retail technologies, ensuring they align with business objectives and architectural standards.', 'Stay informed about emerging retail technologies and trends to support strategic planning and technological innovation.'], 'Qualifications:': ['Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.', 'Have the experience in the application design or solution architect', 'Some experience or knowledge in enterprise architecture, IT strategy, or a related field.', 'Basic understanding of enterprise architecture frameworks (e.g., TOGAF, Zachman, FEAF).', 'Familiarity with cloud architectures, software development, and technology management.', 'Good communication and teamwork skills.', 'Eagerness to learn and work collaboratively with diverse teams.'], 'Preferred Skills:': ['Interest in obtaining Enterprise Architecture certifications (e.g., TOGAF).', 'Enthusiasm for the retail business sector.', 'Organizational and basic project management skills.']}
